programme.title: Sir Al Marjan 2
programme.desc: In season two, Essam tries to dive to search for red coral in the sea, while Hassna feels neglected by him, and disputes begin between them as events unfold.

programme.title: Kadin
programme.desc: Bahar meets Sarp on a ship , they fall in love and get married. Bahar gives birth to a girl named Nisan and a young boy, Doruk, but her life turns upside down when her husband disappears from their lives and shes forced to face life with her two children alone.

programme.title: Koulna Mgharba
programme.desc: It follows a company that summons its best personnel to implement a project in northern Morocco. They are four families hailing from various Moroccan regions, as they live together in a functional building in the city of Asilah. We follow their daily lives, which are not devoid of comedic situations.

programme.title: Kadin

programme.title: My Siblings
programme.desc: The events of the series revolve around the life and fate of four siblings after the death of their father, as they are forced to struggle in life and face some obstacles in their way.

programme.title: Thats My Life
programme.desc: Bahar was adopted by Ilyas and his wife Nuran who dont know that she comes from a rich family. When her rich family looks for her, Ilyas sends them his other daughter Efsun in place of Bahar. Bahars life begins to change completely.

programme.title: El Sharqi Wel Gharbi
programme.desc: A love tale between a young man and a young woman from two conflicting families with old differences leads to conflict. They endure tremendous struggles that test their affections as betrayal overlaps and represents the clash of power, influence, and morality when their families reject this love.

programme.title: My Siblings
programme.desc: The events of the series revolve around the life and fate of four siblings after the death of their father, as they are forced to struggle in life and face some obstacles in their way.

programme.title: ﺑﺮﻧﺎﻣﺞ مواهب في تجويد القرآن الكريم
Cruel Istanbul
programme.desc: As Seher begins working with Agah Beys kids at her home, the children of the two families start to form curious love triangles, and the horrifying secrets of the mansion start to come to light.

programme.title: Kenza Fi Douar
programme.desc: Kenza, who lives in Casablanca, works in a company specializing in the construction of highways, as she is sent on a task to obtain the approval of residents living in a remote village in order to construct a highway through their village, but she has to deal with their awkward behaviors.

programme.title: Emanet
programme.desc: A girl marries the son of an affluent family after growing up in a modest, impoverished neighborhood. Due to his disapproval of this marriage, her father ends his ties with her. Years later, her husband passes away, leaving her alone with her child and with nowhere to turn.

programme.title: Farawla
programme.desc: Farawla, a fortune teller and the daughter of a doorman, comes out of poverty and becomes a social media celebrity, on a rising journey full of comedic situations, until she becomes a society woman and an expert in the field of energy.

programme.title: Maktabat wa Asrar
programme.desc: A cultural journey to some of the largest and most beautiful libraries around the world, highlighting their contributions throughout history, revealing their secrets, reminding the viewers of the value they contain within their walls, and reviewing the lives of historical figures who spent some of their time in libraries.

programme.title: Hesbet Omry
programme.desc: Disagreements between Hind and her husband Farouk escalate and he throws her out of the house. She seeks to obtain a divorce and demands her right to toil and pursuit and to obtain half of his property. A long war begins between them over this, and many parties intervene on both sides.

programme.title: Sout wa Sora 2: Raqam Sery
programme.desc: The events follow Liqaa, an employee in a bank who finds herself caught up in a dangerous fraud operation after being enmeshed in artificial intelligence technologies.

programme.title: The Resident S6
programme.desc: In season 6, doctors come together to find a solution after Padmas pregnancy becomes at risk, Conrad makes a decision about his love life, and Devon leads his own clinical trial at Chastain.

programme.title: Benim Tatli Yalanim
programme.desc: Nejats wife abandons him, and he has to raise their daughter alone. As Nejats daughter grows up, she becomes resentful of her fathers lies about her mother, until one day Suna enters Nejat and his daughters life and a series of unexpected events occur.

programme.title: Nhar Mabrouk
programme.desc: A comedy about Mabruk, who works as a house guard in Casablanca and suffers from the bad economic situation.

programme.title: Dar El Ghezlane 2
programme.desc: When a doctor is appointed at a village called Dar Al-Ghezlan, hes soon to be shocked by the life at the village as he witnesses the clashes between the two families of Hajj Al-Bahy and Mr. Ismail, each armed with their influence and authority.

programme.title: Souhlifa 1
programme.desc: El Madanys sister asks him to look after her 7-year-old daughter, who is outspoken and naughty, and who manages to turn her uncles life upside down.

programme.title: Yawmiyate Rafiq
programme.desc: The story follows the young man Rafiq, his daily life, his relationship with those around him, and the various comic paradoxes that happen to him.

programme.title: El Sakk Wa Ghanima
programme.desc: The series follows a tribe whose leader owns a tiger, and when it escapes, it creates panic and fear among the residents, who include El Sakk, who creates many problems in the village. Events pass, and the villagers are surprised to see the tigers bones with someones bones next to them, so they believe El Sakk has died.

programme.title: Hami Wlad Aami
programme.desc: A man comes from abroad and visits his cousin in one of the villages. He gets stuck in the village after a flood.

programme.title: Kayna Dorouf
programme.desc: The series follows three women who develop a friendship in prison, but after their release, they try to integrate into society with all its components, but they face many problems and difficulties.

programme.title: Rdat Lwalida
programme.desc: In a dramatic context, the series revolves around an unemployed young Moroccan, who does not benefit from his university degree, which leads him to try to do all the twisted tricks to get a job.

programme.title: Albi we Muftaahu
programme.desc: A divorced woman seeks to return to her husband for the sake of her young son by finding a man to play the role of a temporary husband (muhallil). Then, by chance, she meets a single driver on a rideshare app and asks him to marry her to solve her crisis without revealing to him her true motive for marrying him.

programme.title: Adalat Al Sahara
programme.desc: A Bedouin drama about desert dwellers whose lives are governed by a set of laws based on respect for customs and traditions, carrying the message of the ancestors to the grandchildren. Each episode carries a title such as Mother, Chivalry, Lineage, Returning the Favor, and others.

programme.title: Manzil 12
programme.desc: As Mounira has an extraordinary sense that makes her see things from other worlds, she helps people with that ability, until her young son Sakr dies in a car accident. She decides to get away from everything, and lives a quiet life with her husband, Mohammad, but things take a turn with the arrival of her neighbor, Nadia.

programme.title: Pablo
programme.desc: Sayed Hassan, also known as Pablo, is a self-made man who helps the needy. As he manages to win the trust of a businessman, the latters son grows a strong hatred for him, while his sister is head over heels in love with Pablo.

programme.title: Albi we Muftaahu

Then, by chance, she meets a single driver on a rideshare app and asks him to marry her to solve her crisis without revealing to him her true motive for marrying him.

programme.title: Nuh El Ayn
programme.desc: Between the struggle of good and evil, tales arise, as the domineering shipmaster Omran is looking forward to having an heir, while a brother takes care of his sister, and the selfish rich man who is frequently marrying.

programme.title: Layali Roxy
programme.desc: The events revolve around the making of the first Syrian motion picture in 1928, and the difficulties that surrounded it, shedding light on many aspects of life in that period, especially with the presence of French colonialism in Syria.

programme.title: Albi we Muftaahu

programme.title: Nuh El Ayn
programme.desc: Between the struggle of good and evil, tales arise, as the domineering shipmaster Omran is looking forward to having an heir, while a brother takes care of his sister, and the selfish rich man who is frequently marrying.

programme.title: Layali Roxy
programme.desc: The events revolve around the making of the first Syrian motion picture in 1928, and the difficulties that surrounded it, shedding light on many aspects of life in that period, especially with the presence of French colonialism in Syria.

programme.title: Akhir Al Nahar
programme.desc: A talk show about current events and Egyptian politics, society, and economy with media specialists like Mahmoud Saad, Adel Hamoda, and Khaled Salah as hosts. programme.title: Roh Gedo
programme.desc: The failed plastic surgeon Yasmine performs surgery on a celebrity that goes wrong, which prompts the celebrity to file a lawsuit against her and force her to pay a fine of 10 million pounds. She is forced to sell her palace, but she comes across an old magic book, and she encounters events stranger than fiction.

programme.title: Lunch Box
programme.desc: The lives of three housewives trying to find a solution to their problems. programme.desc: A social drama about Abdel Wahab who shows favoritism towards his children from his second wife, and neglects his daughter Janat whom he had with his first wife. As his children grow up estranged and disconnected from each other, life proves to be turbulent for all of them.

programme.title: Ghadan Naltaqy
programme.desc: The series follows a group of Syrian refugees who escape violence and death in their homeland and move to Lebanon, from the husband whose wife flees to the US, to the incapacitated mother forced to bear witness to the events, to those who support the Assad regime.

programme.title: Al-Pasha
programme.desc: A wealthy gentleman living in a Lebanese town in 1911 uses his financial resources to over-power the poor villagers and attempts to take over their land during a time of famine. His injustice and cruelty reflect on his relationships, even within his own family.

programme.title: Zuqaq El Jinn
programme.desc: The events revolve around the cruel and tyrannical Abu Nadhir, who seeks to control the lives of his family members without any regard for the psychological pain he causes them, while it becomes clear that there are secrets in his life and his past returns to haunt him.

programme.title: The Family
programme.desc: Aslan, who hails from a huge family that owns a nightclub, is known for his brutality, but once he meets Devin, the psychiatrist who will alter his life, everything changes.

programme.title: Yaomiyat Modeer Aam 2
programme.desc: Doctor Ahmed Abd Al-Haq returns to practicing medicine after losing hope to eradicate corruption. As he gets appointed as general manager of another directorate filled with corruption, he has to find different methods to expose bribery and fight corruption other than disguise.

programme.desc: The events revolve around the cruel and tyrannical Abu Nadhir, who seeks to control the lives of his family members without any regard for the psychological pain he causes them, while it becomes clear that there are secrets in his life and his past returns to haunt him.

programme.title: The Family
programme.desc: Aslan, who hails from a huge family that owns a nightclub, is known for his brutality, but once he meets Devin, the psychiatrist who will alter his life, everything changes.

programme.title: Yaomiyat Modeer Aam 2
programme.desc: Doctor Ahmed Abd Al-Haq returns to practicing medicine after losing hope to eradicate corruption. As he gets appointed as general manager of another directorate filled with corruption, he has to find different methods to expose bribery and fight corruption other than disguise.

programme.title: Ghadan Naltaqy
programme.desc: The series follows a group of Syrian refugees who escape violence and death in their homeland and move to Lebanon, from the husband whose wife flees to the US, to the incapacitated mother forced to bear witness to the events, to those who support the Assad regime.

programme.title: Al-Pasha
programme.desc: A wealthy gentleman living in a Lebanese town in 1911 uses his financial resources to over-power the poor villagers and attempts to take over their land during a time of famine. His injustice and cruelty reflect on his relationships, even within his own family.

programme.title: Zuqaq El Jinn
programme.desc: The events revolve around the cruel and tyrannical Abu Nadhir, who seeks to control the lives of his family members without any regard for the psychological pain he causes them, while it becomes clear that there are secrets in his life and his past returns to haunt him.

programme.title: Establishment: Osman S1
programme.desc: A historical biography that chronicles the life of Osman bin Ertuğrul bin Suleyman Shah, the founder of the Ottoman Empire, which ruled various parts of the world for six centuries.

programme.title: Daqeqat Samt
programme.desc: Amir and Adham are two inmates that are facing death sentence. but strange events begin to happen that leads to smuggling them out of prison, by the car of the new director, and the execution of two others instead of them, and then a series of events begin to evolve.

programme.title: برنامج شو في ما في لايت

programme.desc: A multi-part comedy series that deals with various stories and tales in a critical and cynical way, criticizing many social and political situations.

programme.title: First Class
programme.desc: Two half-brothers, Taleb and Abdulsalam, were raised separately, each developing an independent and unique character. They cross paths and are forced to live together. Can they adapt to the new situation and better their understanding of each other?

programme.title: Al- Akdar
programme.desc: A representation of several social daily-life problems encountered in Arab societies in general and Gulf society in particular, shedding light on the changes that came to the surface following the discovery of oil, problems that were passed down to the new generations to make sense of and solve.

programme.title: Balagh Nehaay
programme.desc: Set during a period in the 20th century, where the wealthy Al Montaaz family receives painful blows from all sides, as its members live between moments of love, hate, surrender, and rebellion against all conditions.

programme.title: Tazkaret Dawood
programme.desc: This comedy series revolves around the story of David who is looking for someone to marry with the help of his sister and her husband. Every episode he meets a new girl who he plans to marry, but every time he finds some terrible flaw in the potential bride.

programme.title: Aziz Al Rouh
programme.desc: After returning from abroad, Saud decides to settle down and get married, and he takes the advice of his brother Saleh to marry Hessa, but suspicion enters Sauds heart and he believes that Saleh has seized his money, so he breaks up his partnership with him, leaves the house, leading to a rift between the two brothers.

programme.title: Rommana
programme.desc: In an atmosphere of comedy and fun, the series revolves around Rommana who became rich overnight, then decides to enjoy herself; and as a result, she faces many problems and comedic paradoxes.

programme.title: Noqta Entaha
programme.desc: The pharmacist, Fares Yacoub, struggles to hide his first crime, which he committed by mistake against the teenage brother of his wife, who seeks to uncover the truth about the murder of her only brother.

programme.title: Athaneen
programme.desc: Every Monday, a horror story occurs to a group of people who have in common a mysterious person who terrorizes his victims, only to turn out later to be a psychiatrist who punishes them for past sins.

programme.title: Binayet Hab El Reh
programme.desc: Haseeba rejects the idea of marriage after being exposed to circumstances that caused her to refuse to marry anyone, while those around her try to make her to change her mind.

programme.title: Welad Al Balad
programme.desc: The events revolve around Agha Murad, who plans with his wife to control his fathers palace and fights for that while hiding his cruelty towards the peasants with sweet words, but he tortures them to carry out his demands.

programme.title: Fi Lahza
programme.desc: Farida tries to hold herself together and continue her life normally after her fathers mysterious death, while she seeks to protect her siblings from an unknown fate. However, her life is turned upside down with the appearance of Saif, a prominent businessman, who represents a valuable opportunity to help them get rid of all their problems.

programme.title: Hayaller Ve Hayatlar
programme.desc: The story of four best friends who pursue their goals in life, the challenges they encounter, and how they deal with them.

programme.desc: As John Weir, a master of deceit in the field of espionage, fights to uphold democracy, he gets set up for murder by strong, influential forces that have extensive control over the populace.

programme.desc: New events unfold in season two, as Lois and Clark face difficulties as a couple, and Jonathan has to deal with new challenges on the football team, while Jordan and Sarahs relationship is at risk because of hidden secrets.

programme.title: Justified S6
programme.desc: In the final season of the series, Boyd is recruited to rob banks, and the target is to steal a safe deposit box belonging to Arvie Markham, and Raylan tries his best to catch him.

programme.desc: Billionaire Bobby Axelrod clashes with Attorney General Chuck Rhoades after being charged with fraud. On the other hand, Bobbys financial firm comes under pressure from investors and his relationship with his wife Lara becomes complicated.

programme.title: Battle Creek
programme.desc: The events revolve around two investigators, each with a different point of view, but in the end they form a team together in order to clean the streets of the ongoing battles and rampant crimes.

programme.desc: In the seventh season, the team continues to work on the tasks assigned to them and investigate many new and different crimes that occur in the city. However, they must solve the cases and arrest the perpetrators, in circumstances full of dangers and various challenges.

programme.title: Salma
programme.desc: Salma is a young mother facing life by herself after her husband, Jalal, disappears under mysterious circumstances. She finds herself forced to raise her two children amidst poverty, trauma, and loneliness, as her journey embodies a deeply human example of the suffering of Arab mothers who face the harshness of life with steadfastness.

programme.title: Hekayat Banat 4
programme.desc: The series follows the lives of four girls, their romantic relationships, their private lives, and their dreams and aspirations.

programme.title: Dopamine
programme.desc: The series deals with human emotions in a different way, through a story that revolves around an electronic application called Dopamine that controls emotions and affects human relationships.

programme.title: The Power of Love
programme.desc: Amir is a struggling college graduate who falls in love with Lama, a wealthy young woman, and they decide to get married despite her fathers disapproval. Amir sets out to prove to everyone his competence, by starting his own company in cooperation with Lama and his friend Fathy.

programme.title: Safha Beida
programme.desc: Dhay goes through many strange and mysterious events, and after a murder occurs, Officer Iyad takes over the investigation and discovers three different stories about Dhays life. The facts are revealed to him about an international corruption scandal linked to a famous pharmaceutical company that threatens the lives of patients.

programme.title: Al-Kabir Awy 7
programme.desc: In the seventh season, a year after Al-Kabir married Marbouha, many disputes occur between them, urging them to go to a psychologist. On the other hand, Johnny is trying to do a new project in Al Mazarita.

She finds herself forced to raise her two children amidst poverty, trauma, and loneliness, as her journey embodies a deeply human example of the suffering of Arab mothers who face the harshness of life with steadfastness.

programme.title: The Power of Love
programme.desc: Amir is a struggling college graduate who falls in love with Lama, a wealthy young woman, and they decide to get married despite her fathers disapproval. Amir sets out to prove to everyone his competence, by starting his own company in cooperation with Lama and his friend Fathy.

programme.title: Ana Shahira ... Ana Al-Khain
programme.desc: A two-story tale told from two perspectives, about married couple Raouf and Shahira whose successful relationship turns into a tragedy. Narrated in two parts, 30 episodes each.

programme.title: Hekayat Banat 4
programme.desc: The series follows the lives of four girls, their romantic relationships, their private lives, and their dreams and aspirations.

programme.title: Dopamine
programme.desc: The series deals with human emotions in a different way, through a story that revolves around an electronic application called Dopamine that controls emotions and affects human relationships.

programme.title: Safha Beida
programme.desc: Dhay goes through many strange and mysterious events, and after a murder occurs, Officer Iyad takes over the investigation and discovers three different stories about Dhays life. The facts are revealed to him about an international corruption scandal linked to a famous pharmaceutical company that threatens the lives of patients.

programme.title: Anbar
programme.desc: Rashwan Pashas daughter Anbar becomes confined to the palace, and Rashwan Pasha is treated badly by his relatives until he confesses where he kept the inheritance that theyre supposed to have after hes gone.

programme.title: Al-Hob Fi Al-Thalaja
programme.desc: Mahdi finds an Ad saying that he can keep his body parts intact if he freezes himself. He decides to do it, placed next to him is a slaughtered rooster. They become friends and he tells him that his neighbors wife is having an affair. When the husband finds out, she kills him, and accuses Mahdi of the crime.

programme.title: Teseen Daqeeqa
programme.desc: (Adel) and (Nesma) are in love,but Adels family objects because of the big social difference between them,while (Sherine) is trying to get close to Adel. Adel and Nesma are both in a car accident and Adels mother lies and tells (Adel) that (Nesma) died. The two lovers go on different paths.

programme.title: Fol alfol
programme.desc: Zaghloul is a clown who gets fired from the circus. As he moves between different jobs, he falls in love with Basma and they get married. He meets a rich man who mistakes him for his friend Kazem, which results in a misunderstanding.

programme.title: Atshanh
programme.desc: Samia and Salah get married in the home of Salahs mother, who abuses Samia. Samia is tired of her life, asks for a divorce and works in a company, while Salah tries to succeed as a lawyer.

programme.title: Safir Gohannam
programme.desc: The devil appears to the poor family of Ramadan, incarnated as a wealthy man, and offers them a large fortune. The family gets tempted, and the life of excess spoils them and disintegrates their relations as the husband indulges in all forms of orgies and the wife lives a life of vice. Eventually, the devil appears again to drag the family to hell.

programme.title: Harib min Al-tagneed
programme.desc: Taking advantage of the great similarity between them, poor draftee Mohammeden impersonates the identity of Majid ,a wealthy fugitive from the mental hospital, but discovers that Majids family wants to get rid of him.

programme.title: Al-Hob Fi Al-Thalaja
programme.desc: Mahdi finds an Ad saying that he can keep his body parts intact if he freezes himself. He decides to do it, placed next to him is a slaughtered rooster. They become friends and he tells him that his neighbors wife is having an affair. When the husband finds out, she kills him, and accuses Mahdi of the crime.

programme.title: Fol alfol
programme.desc: Zaghloul is a clown who gets fired from the circus. As he moves between different jobs, he falls in love with Basma and they get married. He meets a rich man who mistakes him for his friend Kazem, which results in a misunderstanding.

programme.title: El-Souq El-Sodaa
programme.desc: Hamed and Nageya have decided to get married. Meanwhile, Sayyed has convinced Nageya’s father to take advantage of the wartime conditions and start trading in the black market. When Hamed stood against this, Nageyas father decided to torture him his way.

programme.title: Aroosa wa gooz ersan
programme.desc: Thuraya works in Asfour theatrical band, and marries director Essam, despite the love of actor Shaker. Essam travels abroad and his ship sinks. Thuraya marries Shaker but Essam returns suddenly and everyone is shocked by this return especially his wife.

programme.title: Jarimat fi alaiemaq
programme.desc: Mohsen owns a shipping company and marries Afaf. On their wedding night, the mother gives her a priceless necklace. When Mohsen loses his money on gambling , he steals her valuable necklace. After their boat sinks along with the safe containing the necklace,Mohsen dives with his wife to search for it.

programme.title: Awdet Elnadla
programme.desc: A married couple earn their living by stealing,but during one of their heists the wife get caught while the husband escapes. After she is sent to jail,she gets released to find her husband married to a wealthy woman. The husband then tries to keep her away from his new life.

programme.title: Afarit Al-Asphalt
programme.desc: Abdullah works as a driver on his fathers microbus, alternating shifts with his son Ali. His sister remains unmarried despite her old age. A complex web of forbidden relationships spreads in the area where they live.

programme.title: Anbar
programme.desc: Rashwan Pashas daughter Anbar becomes confined to the palace, and Rashwan Pasha is treated badly by his relatives until he confesses where he kept the inheritance that theyre supposed to have after hes gone.

programme.title: Nida aldam
programme.desc: Businessman Shawki wants to marry his secretary, but finds out that she loves her cousin Adel and will get married soon. Shawki decides to frame Adel who gets unfairly imprisoned.

programme.title: Aroosa wa gooz ersan
programme.desc: Thuraya works in Asfour theatrical band, and marries director Essam, despite the love of actor Shaker. Essam travels abroad and his ship sinks. Thuraya marries Shaker but Essam returns suddenly and everyone is shocked by this return especially his wife.

programme.title: Si Omar
programme.desc: Gaber Afandi works at Omar Al-Alfys estate, he gets fired by the manager when he discovers forgery in the accounting sheets. He travels to Cairo where he accidentally goes to Al-Alfys house and gets mistaken by the family for their absent son Omar because of the striking resemblance between them.

programme.title: Halet Hob
programme.desc: The story of a broken up family in which the father and the oldest son live in Europe while the mother and the younger son live in Egypt. The older brother decides to travel back to Egypt to know his family better.

programme.title: Aalam Tany
programme.desc: After the pianist Nagham has an accident, she finds herself at a crossroads, as she reaches a stage of spiritual transparency that enables her to find the truth about those closest to her.

Ma Tarah Laysa Kama Yabdo
programme.desc: The events depict seven separate stories, through which multiple and diverse genres are presented, combining social, suspenseful, and human elements. Each story consists of five episodes.

programme.title: Al-Jawarih
programme.desc: Sanaa is an elementary school teacher in a rural area, who was divorced twice due to her inability to conceive, so she decided to devote herself to addressing the problems of the students. But her life takes a turn when she loses a child during a school trip to the zoo, as she begins the search for the missing girl.

programme.title: Bein Alameen
programme.desc: The series mirrors the money-power struggle through the representation of Marwan, a real estate company owner, who, despite being devout, focuses primarily on concepts like profit and money interest.

programme.title: Farawla
programme.desc: Farawla, a fortune teller and the daughter of a doorman, comes out of poverty and becomes a social media celebrity, on a rising journey full of comedic situations, until she becomes a society woman and an expert in the field of energy.

programme.title: Souq El Kanto
programme.desc: Taking place in Kanto market, the events follow the lives of the markets people, the most important of whom is Taha and his family, who are major textile merchants in the market, and the disputes between them and other merchants, in addition to Rawia, who is led by circumstances to the market.

programme.title: Sout wa Sora 2: Raqam Sery
programme.desc: The events follow Liqaa, an employee in a bank who finds herself caught up in a dangerous fraud operation after being enmeshed in artificial intelligence technologies.

programme.title: Ma Tarah Laysa Kama Yabdo
programme.desc: The events depict seven separate stories, through which multiple and diverse genres are presented, combining social, suspenseful, and human elements. Each story consists of five episodes.

Although the team is united by one goal, each member has his own motives and goals that he seeks to achieve.

programme.title: Dirty Laundry
programme.desc: The lives of the wealthiest and most influential families in Istanbul, and their maids frequently become a part of their stories after being exposed to the mysteries, secrets, and murders kept behind closed doors.

programme.title: Banat El Mahrousa
programme.desc: Three girls, Lynn, Saadia, and Shana, from different families live in the El Mahrousa neighborhood. Mr. Hassan enters their lives to manipulate them to take revenge on the wealthy man of the neighborhood.

programme.title: My Siblings S4
programme.desc: In the fourth season, the success of the cooking program started by Sengul and Orhan continues at full speed, and Sengul is still seeking to implement various plans of her own. Some facts suddenly appear and shock the Eren brothers, but they face Akif and Nebahat with great horror.

programme.title: Yawmiyat Zoga Mafrusa Awy 2
programme.desc: After the success of her book "Diaries of a Very Angry Wife", the journalist Engy continues to recount the various comic situations with her husband Ali, who works with her in the same newspaper, and the many arguments they get into.

programme.title: Grand Otel
programme.desc: Set in the 1950s, Ali starts to investigate the disappearance of his sister, who worked as a maid in one of the largest hotels in Aswan.

programme.title: Sharee Tesaah
programme.desc: After a wealthy businessmans daughter, living on St. 9 in Maadi, suddenly disappears, her husband comes back from abroad to search for her, only to discover that she was murdered in mysterious circumstances, to which several other St. 9 residents are linked.

programme.title: Altaasiea
programme.desc: The talk show program on Egyptian Channel 1 is concerned with reviewing the most important local and international news and events, in addition to hosting stars in the fields of art and sports.

programme.title: Sabah El Khair Ya Masr
programme.desc: One of the most famous morning programs that provides interactive services, such as opinion polls and viewer participation on many important issues raised in Egypt.

programme.title: Al Boum
programme.desc: It follows the journey of an Emirati sailor, as he attempts to build a maritime economic empire at the height of World War II.

programme.title: Bokaat Daw 14
programme.desc: Carrying on with the previous seasons’ direction, the series returns with more hilarious situations, exposing some contradicting and conflicting actions within the Syrian society, and comically criticizing them.

programme.title: Al-Fetewa
programme.desc: In the world of local neighborhoods, a sect of strong people come together to manage the affairs of these neighborhoods. Known as Al-Fetewa, they are ruffians who shoulder the responsibility of the people in their neighborhoods.

programme.title: Bayt Ahly
programme.desc: The events take place in the 1940s, after Nouri leaves prison, a major conflict arises between him and Abu Adnan, coinciding with the assassination of the doctor, Abdul Rahman Al Shahbandar.

programme.title: Hesbet Omry
programme.desc: Disagreements between Hind and her husband Farouk escalate and he throws her out of the house. She seeks to obtain a divorce and demands her right to toil and pursuit and to obtain half of his property. A long war begins between them over this, and many parties intervene on both sides.

programme.title: Al Baa Tahtuhu Noqta
programme.desc: A group of women join a literacy school, but they face some difficulties in learning and adhering to the school’s rules. Many funny situations arise between them and the staff due to their different nationalities and dialects, while their husbands, on the other hand, seek to thwart their plans.

programme.title: Ma Ekhtalafna

programme.title: Ammuna Al Mazyouna

programme.desc: The events of the series revolve around several social issues, such as family disintegration between children, the dominance of matter over morals and principles, and the oppression of women.

programme.title: W Teqabel Habib
programme.desc: After a wealthy woman discovers that her husband has cheated on her and married another, she decides to separate from him and searches for a new romance, but she gets involved in various conflicts that she did not expect, and her life gradually changes along the way.

programme.title: Dayman Amer

programme.title: Salah Al-Din Al-Ayoubi
programme.desc: A biopic that chronicles the life of the legendary leader Saladin, starting from the reign of Imad al-Din Zengi, going through the reign of his son Nur al-Din, and finally covering the reign of Saladin and his greatest achievement in the Battle of Hattin and wresting back control of Palestine.

programme.title: Salah Al-Din Al-Ayoubi

programme.title: Swiss Family Robinson
programme.desc: The story of the girl Flone who moves with her family to live in Australia, but a severe storm causes the family to become shipwrecked on an island, as they try to adapt to their new surroundings, until they are able to leave it and reach Australia with the help of Captain Morton.

programme.title: After Freedom
programme.desc: A young, ambitious businessman seeks fast success. He opens a project to realize his dreams, but his life turns upside down after committing a serious crime. He tries to find a way out of its consequences, while his life and the lives of those around him become under intense pressure.

programme.title: Kimia
programme.desc: The story of the complex and intertwined social relationships within the Kimia family as the strict father, who works as an officer, confronts his daughter who challenges his authority. When the family gets involved in a major conspiracy, Kimia tries to save them.

programme.title: Memories of an Unfinished Man
programme.desc: In the late 1940s, Humayun Bursin reads the memoirs of his recently deceased grandfather, Humayun, and discovers how his grandfather was subjected to a government conspiracy to prevent him from helping the people.

programme.title: Anam
programme.desc: Maral has lived a hard life, full of strife and difficulties. Its only her strong will that enables her to restore peace in her family life. But just as she thinks that her life has stabilized, an old secret comes back to haunt her and rob her of the peace she worked so hard to achieve.

programme.title: Remembrance
programme.desc: The show is about people whose lives and fates are connected as they go on a trip to find their secrets and fix their relationships with a new perspective on life.

programme.title: Wadi-us-Salaam
programme.desc: The events take place inside the Wadi-us-Salaam cemetery, which is the largest cemetery in the world, and follow an Iraqi soldier who came out of the war with shrapnel stuck in his head along with pictures and memories of the martyrs he lived with.

programme.title: Wadi-us-Salaam

programme.title: Leabet El Enteqam
programme.desc: An unknown person threatens to kidnap and kill the girl Oroub, who manages to be nominated as the chairwoman of her contracting company’s board of directors. As Oroub tries to change the corrupt policies of the company, she finds herself in for a fierce battle.

programme.title: Jazeerat Ghamam
programme.desc: When Khaldoun and the gypsy Al-Ayqa settle on Ghamam island, they try to control its people, thinking that it contains a treasure and a great secret that no one knows. As they try to extend their influence to implement their plan, will the people of the island confront them led by Arafat, El Ajami, and Muharib?

programme.desc: When Khaldoun and the gypsy Al-Ayqa settle on Ghamam island, they try to control its people, thinking that it contains a treasure and a great secret that no one knows. As they try to extend their influence to implement their plan, will the people of the island confront them led by Arafat, El Ajami, and Muharib?

programme.title: Masa Alkhayr ya Kuwait
programme.desc: A daily 6 p.m.–7 p.m. show on the Kuwait Channel that covers a range of social and cultural subjects related to Kuwaiti society and the different problems that take place within it.

programme.title: Nesr El Saeed
programme.desc: The police officer Zain (Mohammed Ramadan) is in a fierce confrontation with Hitler, an Upper Egyptian businessman engaged in illicit trade, the conflict between them intensifies, while Zain finds himself torn between the love of two women, one of whom is his cousin.

programme.title: Layali El Kuwait 8
programme.desc: A talk show that discusses in each episode a number of important issues in various fields of interest to the Kuwaiti citizen, and describes his daily life.

programme.title: Al Dawama
programme.desc: Taking place during the 1920s and 1930s in Kuwait; Fahd returns with the news of the death of his lifelong friend Saud, and Abu Mejbal suspects Fahd’s involvement in the matter, and insists on searching for the truth, while Rashid returns from India and reveals something that was not expected.

programme.title: Al Aar
programme.desc: The series revolves around the family of Haj Abd Alsattar, who is a drug dealer and is assisted by his eldest son without the knowledge of his family. When Abd Alsattar dies, his sons learn the truth from their elder brother, and they decide to complete a drug deal so as not to lose their money.

programme.title: Sayidati
programme.desc: The program discusses all issues related to Saudi women in particular and Arab women in general and includes six segments, the first of which is fixed and presents the details of the episode and special reports.

programme.title: Sayf Bared
programme.desc: Yasmine lives with her family and takes over the management of her father’s company after his death. Laila becomes jealous of her, coveting her extreme wealth. She impersonates her and meets Khaled to get Yasmine into a fleeting relationship, but things turn in Yasmine’s favor. At the same time, Joud gets to know Badr and a love story develops between them.

programme.title: Farq Khebra
programme.desc: Nagy, a quiet dreamer, embarks on a surprising journey discovering life, love, and human relationships when an unplanned encounter with Salma prompts him to go on an adventure and escape from his family problems.

programme.title: Kasr Adm 2: Al Saradib
programme.desc: In the second season, Abu Rayyan returns with many secrets and cases, at the same time, Brigadier General Kanaan Al Sayegh is responsible for uncovering corruption cases and confronting their perpetrators.

programme.title: Loghz Al Aqwiya
programme.desc: The events revolve around the work of the judicial police in investigating cases of kidnapping, murder, and revenge, and also include a love story between Officer Wael El Deeb and Marwa.

programme.title: Iliski Durumu: Karisik
programme.desc: The aspiring writer Ayseguls life takes an unexpected turn when she crosses paths with the famous actor Can Tekin while on vacation.

programme.title: Ebtasem Ayoha El General
programme.desc: The events revolve around a tyrannical ruling family that has seized the reins of power in the country, and a conflict arises between two brothers, one of whom inherited the presidency from his father, while the axis of the conflict centers around power and influence in the country without taking into account whats good for it or the citizens.

programme.title: Bolded Red
programme.desc: A social program presented by the journalist Malek Maktabi, where it discusses Lebanese and Arab social issues through the words of its owners. In each of its episodes, the program hosts guests from Lebanon and the Arab world to discuss social issues.

programme.title: Mesh Ana
programme.desc: A man who has mastered the art of making wrong decisions finds himself living with a woman, and a romance blossoms between them. Along the way, the series sheds light on other issues like unemployment, obesity, the servants situation, and other problems facing the Lebanese society.

programme.title: Ebtasem Ayoha El General

programme.title: Raseef El Ghorabaa
programme.desc: Years after the murder of his father, Kamal tries to take revenge on his aunt Warda and her adopted daughter Lara, seize their money, and drive a wedge between Lara and her fiance, Bassem, while Nadim, the son of the poor farmer Halim, hides his identity from Lara, whom he has deeply loved as a child.

programme.title: Naharukum Saeid
programme.desc: A regular morning program that hosts local politicians to talk about subjects that are important to the people in Lebanon and to debate the latest events in the political scene. When it was launched in 1996, the program dealt with political events in a small segment lasting half an hour, and the rest of the program period was about cultural and other matters.

programme.title: Mesh Ana
programme.desc: A man who has mastered the art of making wrong decisions finds himself living with a woman, and a romance blossoms between them. Along the way, the series sheds light on other issues like unemployment, obesity, the servants situation, and other problems facing the Lebanese society.

programme.title: Raseef El Ghorabaa

programme.desc: The series follows a group of social and romantic tales that take place in Syria between 2013 and 2014 during the political turmoil that followed the revolution, including the story of the corrupt Abu Moatasem, his daughter Hanan, the soldier Diaa and Homoum who works for an organ trafficking gang.

programme.title: Zemen Al-Barghout
programme.desc: A look into Syria from 1918-1925 through the tales of the residents of the Ayyash neighborhood and how their lives change as the Ottoman occupation of Syria ends, King Faisal arrives and the French occupation begins and the resistance of the Syrian people, through the battle of Maysalun and the Syrian revolution.

programme.title: Al Khataya

programme.title: Films and Stars
programme.desc: A program that is shown every Sunday, covering news from the world of Hollywood. It also provides scenes of films, revenues, and many topics and news of interest to cinema lovers around the world.

programme.title: Trolls World Tour
programme.desc: With the existence of several Troll tribes, each tribe has their own genre of music that they are dedicated to. Poppy and Branch set out to protect that diversification after they learn of the nefarious plot of the rock queen, who wants to take over the other tribes to make her genre reign supreme.

programme.title: The Croods
programme.desc: The prehistoric Croods must relocate when their darling home cave is destroyed. Thus begins the first family road trip in human history. The Croods discover an incredible new world beyond, and their outlook is changed forever.

programme.title: 500 Days of Summer
programme.desc: Smitten with the new secretary on first sight, Tom has to fight tooth and nail to convince Summer to give them a chance, as she remains convinced that love and romance only exists in fairytales.

programme.title: Action Zone
programme.desc: A program that offers a look at the latest films that are premiering in international theaters, and the film scenes that baffled audiences, in addition to many exclusive interviews.

programme.title: The Edge of Seventeen
programme.desc: The 17-year-old Nadine tries to make sense of the challenges thrown down her way as she grows up, suffering the depression of losing her father, and a shattered friendship with Krista who dates Nadines brother, Darian. Nadine finds solace with her teacher, Mr. Bruner, and a talented classmate.

programme.title: Laggies
programme.desc: Feeling overwhelmed by the pressures of being an adult, Megan decides to take a break and hides at the house of a new teenager friend and her single father.

programme.title: Faster
programme.desc: Driver (Dwayne "The Rock" Johnson) seeks revenge against those who put him in prison as well as those who killed his brother. After 10 years, he is released from prison, drives through the deserts of Nevada in search of his enemies while being chased by a contract killer (Oliver Jackson-Cohen) and a veteran cop (Billy Bob Thornton).

programme.title: Once Upon a Time in Hollywood
programme.desc: In1969 LA, the career of the once-famed actor Rick Dalton is put on the line due to his alcoholism, along with that of his stunt double, Cliff Booth. The two aspire to find some fame and success in the film industry just as the Manson Family plots their most infamous crime.

programme.title: The Commuter
programme.desc: A former cops commute takes a dark turn when his wifes life is held as leverage against him identifying a mysterious passenger on the train he is on. With time running out, the stakes have never been so high as he is drawn into a complex conspiracy with a deadly outcome.

programme.title: The Transporter Refueled
programme.desc: When former mercenary-turned-contract driver Frank Martin is hired by a mysterious woman for a job, he finds himself embroiled in a dangerous game, since the woman has her own vendetta that she wants to settle with a Russian mobster.

programme.title: After Earth
programme.desc: Will Smith and son Jaden co-star as the legendary Cypher and son Kitai, who crash land on an abandoned Earth a millennium after humanitys escape. With Cypher injured, teenage Kitai has to brave the hostile environment, brimming with aggressive evolved animal species and aliens, on his own to look for help.

programme.title: Ad Astra
programme.desc: A military based engineer travels to the outer edges of the solar system to find his missing father who disappeared while on a mission in search of space life twenty years ago.

programme.title: Cloud Atlas
programme.desc: Six separate stories, different in time, place and nature, somehow become intertwined in a complicated way. Narrated from a diary of a sea voyage in 1849, some letter from a musician to a lover and a piece of work from the 70s, it revolves around a nuclear power plant, a detained publisher, a Korean girl-clone and a Hawaiian tribe living in a post-apocalypse world.

Dr. Adrian Helmsley is an American geologist who, while on a trip to India, learns that there has been increased solar activity. Dr. Helmsley also discovers that this will lead to a rise in the temperature of Earth’s core – a phenomenon which will have dire consequences for humanity. 2012 is said to be the end date of the Mayan calendar, which many believe marks the end of the world.

programme.title: Sing 2
programme.desc: As Buster Moon tries with his troupe to put on a new show at the Crystal Tower Theater, he desperately seeks out retired rock legend Clay Calloway to get him to perform in the show.

programme.desc: The 17-year-old Nadine tries to make sense of the challenges thrown down her way as she grows up, suffering the depression of losing her father, and a shattered friendship with Krista who dates Nadines brother, Darian. Nadine finds solace with her teacher, Mr. Bruner, and a talented classmate.

programme.title: Trolls World Tour
programme.desc: With the existence of several Troll tribes, each tribe has their own genre of music that they are dedicated to. Poppy and Branch set out to protect that diversification after they learn of the nefarious plot of the rock queen, who wants to take over the other tribes to make her genre reign supreme.

programme.title: Ad Astra
programme.desc: A military based engineer travels to the outer edges of the solar system to find his missing father who disappeared while on a mission in search of space life twenty years ago.

programme.title: After Earth
programme.desc: Will Smith and son Jaden co-star as the legendary Cypher and son Kitai, who crash land on an abandoned Earth a millennium after humanitys escape. With Cypher injured, teenage Kitai has to brave the hostile environment, brimming with aggressive evolved animal species and aliens, on his own to look for help.

Dr. Adrian Helmsley is an American geologist who, while on a trip to India, learns that there has been increased solar activity. Dr. Helmsley also discovers that this will lead to a rise in the temperature of Earth’s core – a phenomenon which will have dire consequences for humanity. 2012 is said to be the end date of the Mayan calendar, which many believe marks the end of the world.

programme.title: Fantastic Mr. Fox
programme.desc: Mr. Fox loves to chase and steal chickens and roosters. When he is arrested during one of his attempts, he promises his wife to quit stealing, and looks for another job. After two years, he moves with his family close to the evil farmers, who try to get rid of him, so he decides to stand up to them.

programme.title: Moonrise Kingdom
programme.desc: Set in the sixties, in an island in New England, a 12-year-old boy and girl fall in love and secretly plan to run away together. This angers the authorities in the island, and the situation escalates to the point where they attempt to track the young couple in all directions.

programme.desc: An animated series about the adventures of the four ninja turtles: Dontello, Michelangelo, Raphael and Leonardo in New York.

programme.desc: A team of friends who enjoy playing with marble balls decides to enter the Olympia tournament in hopes of winning a marble called Mercury, which has limitless powers.

programme.desc: Ian, his sister Myrva, and their powerful friend Gmor unite to fight the corrupt and evil creatures and repel them from their world. For this purpose, they go on many exciting adventures full of dangers.

programme.title: Bahar

programme.title: Ser 2: Al Tahadi
programme.desc: After his release from prison, Amer Badrans battle to confront Detective Gad again begins, while he works with the Don in the contraband trade, as events escalate.

programme.title: Iilaa Ana 2
programme.desc: In season two of this anthology series, new stories are presented, each one in ten episodes, which tackle societys issues of concern in general and womens issues in particular. Among these stories are Family Home, The Story of My Life, and The Taste of Life.

programme.title: My Name Is Farah S2
programme.desc: After a long chase, Behnam finally finds Farah, and at the same time, Tahir is released and faces many challenges, from an attempted murder to attempts to dissuade him from his plan for revenge.

programme.title: Al Ameel
programme.desc: It follows two brothers, Amir and Wissam, who have been separated by fate since childhood. Amir grows up to become a police officer, who infiltrates a gang as part of a secret operation. While Wissam, who was kidnapped when he was a child, grows up to become part of the same gang. Unbeknownst to them, the two brothers work together and their fates are intertwined.

programme.desc: A cooking and competition show that tours Dubai, Beirut, and Riyadh, where many contestants participate to win the Top Chef title, and each contestant must prepare a special dish using local products.

programme.title: My Name Is Farah
programme.desc: Farah fled Iran and is now employed illegally as a cleaner in Istanbul. Her life is turned upside down when she witnesses a murder at work, preventing her from traveling to France to care for her ill son. She then makes an attempt to flee from the criminals after they identify her.

programme.title: Woh Toh Hai Albelaa
programme.desc: The story follows Krishna, a cheerful guy who loves his two brothers and always stands by them, especially his older brother Chiranjeev, then his life turns upside down when circumstances force him to marry Chiranjeevs sweetheart.

programme.title: The Unfaithful S2
programme.desc: In season 2, Asya decides to travel to Istanbul to build a new life with her son, Ali, after what happened with her husband, but something unexpected changes the course of events.

programme.title: Tas Kagit Makas
programme.desc: A cleaner who suffers from Alzheimers is accused of murder, and his son, who has an uncanny memory, must help him, as he has become his last hope of survival and proving his innocence in the face of a powerful family in Istanbul.

programme.title: Chahadat Milad 2
programme.desc: In season two, Narjes discovers that Kalthoum and Qasim are not her real parents, and that she was replaced with another child when she was born, which leads to a series of events to unfold.

programme.title: Kamel El Adad
programme.desc: When Ahmed, a plastic surgeon, and Laila, the owner of a cosmetics project, meet, they soon fall in love with each other, but their different family circumstances stand in the way of their relationship, but they decide to get married and defy the circumstances.

programme.title: Tas Kagit Makas
programme.desc: A cleaner who suffers from Alzheimers is accused of murder, and his son, who has an uncanny memory, must help him, as he has become his last hope of survival and proving his innocence in the face of a powerful family in Istanbul.

programme.title: Ish Ish
programme.desc: Ish Ish inherits her mothers beauty and poverty, and finds herself working as a dancer against her will. Then, by chance, she enters the world of the Gretelli family, only to discover that her tragic present is nothing but an extension of family secrets buried in this family.

programme.title: Kamel El Adad
programme.desc: When Ahmed, a plastic surgeon, and Laila, the owner of a cosmetics project, meet, they soon fall in love with each other, but their different family circumstances stand in the way of their relationship, but they decide to get married and defy the circumstances.

programme.title: Chahadat Milad 2
programme.desc: In season two, Narjes discovers that Kalthoum and Qasim are not her real parents, and that she was replaced with another child when she was born, which leads to a series of events to unfold.

programme.title: Rahma
programme.desc: After years of suffering, Rahma finds herself trapped in a toxic marriage. Seeking to take revenge and rewrite her destiny, Rahma musters the strength to confront her past and build a new life for herself.

programme.title: My Name Is Farah
programme.desc: Farah fled Iran and is now employed illegally as a cleaner in Istanbul. Her life is turned upside down when she witnesses a murder at work, preventing her from traveling to France to care for her ill son. She then makes an attempt to flee from the criminals after they identify her.

programme.title: Woh Toh Hai Albelaa
programme.desc: The story follows Krishna, a cheerful guy who loves his two brothers and always stands by them, especially his older brother Chiranjeev, then his life turns upside down when circumstances force him to marry Chiranjeevs sweetheart.

programme.title: The Unfaithful S2
programme.desc: In season 2, Asya decides to travel to Istanbul to build a new life with her son, Ali, after what happened with her husband, but something unexpected changes the course of events.

programme.title: Ana Horra
programme.desc: Nour endures a difficult marriage to a narcissistic husband who subjected her to psychological and physical violence. Her personal struggle quickly turns into a conflict with society as a whole after her husband gets custody of their daughter, Farah. Between pain and hope, Nour continues her arduous search for dignity and freedom.

programme.title: Ish Ish
programme.desc: Ish Ish inherits her mothers beauty and poverty, and finds herself working as a dancer against her will. Then, by chance, she enters the world of the Gretelli family, only to discover that her tragic present is nothing but an extension of family secrets buried in this family.

programme.title: One Piece
programme.desc: Monkey D. Luffy ate a fruit called Devil Fruit - Rubber to turn into a rubber boy when he was young. At the age of 17, he decides to go on a journey to sail the seas in search of the legendary treasure One Piece that Gol D. Roger mentioned before his execution. He is accompanied by a team of 8 people. What does fate have in store for them?

programme.title: One Piece
programme.desc: Monkey D. Luffy ate a fruit called Devil Fruit - Rubber to turn into a rubber boy when he was young. At the age of 17, he decides to go on a journey to sail the seas in search of the legendary treasure One Piece that Gol D. Roger mentioned before his execution. programme.title: Action Ma Waleed
programme.desc: A diverse sports program presented by Saudi writer Waleed Al Farraj on the MBC Action channel, in which he hosts sports analysts and sports stars. The program reviews the most important events and news of the Saudi Pro League, aka the Roshn Saudi League.

programme.title: Parmanu: The Story of Pokhran
programme.desc: The film takes a look at the series of secret nuclear tests conducted by the Indian army in Pokhran in 1988, and the events behind the scenes of these tests.

programme.title: Uff Yeh Love Hai Mushkil
programme.desc: It follows an emotionally isolated lawyer who does not trust women. His life takes an unexpected turn when he meets a lively young woman who juggles multiple jobs and raising her younger siblings. Many confrontations and funny situations arise between them, whether at home or in the courtroom, and love finds its way into their hearts.

programme.title: Bade Achhe Lagte Hain 2
programme.desc: Priya and Ram are two people from different worlds. As circumstances bring them together, they get married, and over time, their bond gets stronger as they fall in love.

programme.title: جاناك
programme.desc: An ambitious young woman sets out on her journey to fulfill a promise she made to her mother for a better life, but she faces many difficulties and losses. Her life becomes more complicated when she meets a man who poses a new challenge in her path, forcing her to confront complex feelings and situations as she seeks to overcome her adversities.

programme.title: Yeh Rishta Kya Kehlata Hai
programme.desc: After being forced into an arranged marriage, Akshara and Naitik eventually grow to love one another and work through their familys issues as a couple.

programme.title: Jabariya Jodi
programme.desc: The film revolves around a thug recruited to kidnap grooms at their weddings to avoid paying dowries as is the case in India.

programme.title: Animal
programme.desc: When the gangster James "Animal" Allen is sentenced to jail, he meets a revolutionary who changes his views on life. After Animal is released on probation, he finds his son leading the same violent path that he once followed.

programme.title: Leh Laa 3
programme.desc: A divorced single mother, Sherry, is very attached to her son, Yaseen. When she falls in love again, Yaseen’s jealousy over her proves to be an obstacle they must overcome together.

programme.title: Waledy Al Aziz
programme.desc: A failed love story ends with the separation of the couple, but when they meet again after many years, sparks fly again and their love reignites.

programme.title: Zelzal
programme.desc: Harbi buys a house in installments from Khalil who refuses to register the house in Harbis name after he completes the payment. When the earthquake of 1992 happens, Harbi dies. Khalil refuses to hand over the land to the heirs and clashes with Harbis son, Mohamed, who loves Khalils daughter.

programme.title: Kasr Adm
programme.desc: The powerful man Al-Hakam facilitates illegal smuggling through some corrupt policemen, despite the fact that his son Rayan is a police officer who goes after outlaws.

programme.title: Manzil 12
programme.desc: As Mounira has an extraordinary sense that makes her see things from other worlds, she helps people with that ability, until her young son Sakr dies in a car accident. She decides to get away from everything, and lives a quiet life with her husband, Mohammad, but things take a turn with the arrival of her neighbor, Nadia.

programme.title: Wild Bees
programme.desc: After their fathers death, three girls must confront the richest man in their village who wants to buy their fields forcefully by offering several temptations.

programme.title: Mujhe Pyar Hua Tha
programme.desc: Saad falls in love with his cousin Maheer. However, he cannot confess his love and feelings for her, upon which his life takes an unexpected turn.

programme.title: Dahab Ghali
programme.desc: The poor young man Ghali meets the wealthy Dahab, and despite the social difference between them, they fall in love. When Dahab introduces him to her family, Ghali decides to hide his history of theft from them.

programme.title: Golden Boy
programme.desc: The events take place in a dramatic framework, where Halis Aga, who is one of the pillars of the well-established families in the city of Gaziantep, decides to marry off his troublesome grandson Ferit, and then the events continue.

programme.title: Saraya Abdeen 1
programme.desc: A period drama about the time of Khedive Ismail Pashas reign, focusing on the inside world of Abdeen palace, where competitive conflict develops between the Harem in order to win the Khedives heart, against a backdrop of political tension and unrest.

programme.title: Om Arbaa Wa Arbaeen
programme.desc: Eight women in their 40s face many life challenges together, on the familial, emotional, and professional levels, as each one of them seeks to have stability in her life on all fronts and to achieve her ambitions before it is too late.

programme.title: Esref Ruya
programme.desc: Esref, a wealthy and careless businessman, falls in love with Ruya, whom he has been looking for all of his life. However, he is unaware that she is collaborating with the police against him.

programme.title: Dirty Laundry
programme.desc: The lives of the wealthiest and most influential families in Istanbul, and their maids frequently become a part of their stories after being exposed to the mysteries, secrets, and murders kept behind closed doors.

programme.title: Dofaat Alqahera
programme.desc: The experiences of the first group of Kuwaiti students studying in Egypt in 1956 and the story of their different journeys.

programme.title: Raisinghani vs Raisinghani
programme.desc: The smart and skilled lawyer Anushka works with her ambitious coworker Virat, but their lives change after the appearance of the trainee Ankita, who hides her true intentions under the pretense of looking for a job opportunity.

programme.title: Abo El Banat
programme.desc: A father who tries to deal with the challenges of daily life with his daughters and to make a lot of sacrifice for them, but fate reveals what his sister Marayim did in the past, as she switched one of his daughters with the son of the wedding singer Laila for a hidden motive.

programme.desc: A program presented by producer and actor Hassan Assiri, in which he hosts a number of celebrities, asks them several different questions, and puts them in strange situations.

programme.desc: Alya impersonates the identity of Ghazal with the aim of finding her son who suddenly disappeared. As she disguises herself as a girl living in a working-class neighborhood full of drug dealers, she is forced to use tricks and violence to reach her missing son.

programme.title: Kalam Al Nas
programme.desc: A program broadcasting on MBC Egypt from Thursday to Sunday at six P.M., presented by media personality Yasmine Ezz, in which she hosts a number of celebrities and artists.

programme.title: Golden Boy
programme.desc: The events take place in a dramatic framework, where Halis Aga, who is one of the pillars of the well-established families in the city of Gaziantep, decides to marry off his troublesome grandson Ferit, and then the events continue.

programme.title: Cobra
programme.desc: The owner of a car repair shop faces many obstacles in his life and is exposed to strange situations that put him in a struggle between good and evil.

programme.title: Yahduth fee Misr
programme.desc: A daily program presented by the Egyptian broadcaster Sharif Amer about different readings and analyses of the news in Egypt with an integrated team of experts in all different fields. The program presents the concerns of the Egyptian street, peoples issues, political events, and others in a different way using technology and a network of correspondents all over Egypt.

programme.title: El Laeeb
programme.desc: A program presented by Muhib Abdel Hadi, which highlights Egyptian football stars, and takes us behind the scenes of their world to provide us with details about their lives that are seen for the first time.

programme.title: Hakim Basha
programme.desc: As Hakim works in excavating and trading in antiquities, his uncle puts all the family’s property in his hands due to his intelligence and his supporting him in managing his business. He then becomes the patriarch of the family and controls its affairs, but his enemies soon multiply, and conspiracies surround him from every direction, even from those closest to him.

programme.title: Melh wa Somra
programme.desc: The nurse Hind lives a happy and quiet life on the professional and family levels, but things turn upside down when she crosses paths with the lawyer Ikhlas, leading to a series of unforeseen events.

programme.title: Golden Boy S3
programme.desc: In season 3, everyones lives change as Ferit and Seyran separate and each of them becomes involved with someone else, which upends their lives, but the love between them still remains.

programme.title: Uzak Sehir
programme.desc: A woman and her son travel to the country of her late husband, but his wealthy family forbids them from leaving, sparking a conflict as horrific secrets come to light.

programme.title: Ayelti Terbah
programme.desc: An entertaining competition program that brings together two competing families and they are asked many questions related to daily, family, social, and professional life.

programme.title: Heera
programme.desc: Love and revenge meet in one place when Samar decides, with the help of Suhail, to take revenge on Adnan for killing her parents when she was young, and she succeeds in coming between Jamal and Farida, who discovers a shocking thing that she did not expect.

programme.title: Men ... Elaa
programme.desc: Walid finds himself in a dark spiral when a horrific murder takes place in his home and he loses his son. Furthermore, his pregnant wife Sarah disappears, and he learns of her fake identity, while a criminal past haunts her.

programme.title: Zai El Qamar
programme.desc: A series of unrelated stories that each comprise five episodes, tackling many issues that trouble women.

programme.title: Taht Sabe Ard
programme.desc: Officer Musa exploits his power to achieve personal gain in corrupt and twisted ways, which puts him in direct confrontation with the people he is blackmailing, while he discovers that his two siblings are counterfeiting dollars, and he finds himself in a difficult dilemma, torn between leaving them to confront the gangs alone, or managing this business himself to protect them.

programme.desc: After she and her husband Ahmed return from her sister Magdas wedding, Jawhara is surprised by a woman putting a baby next to a dumpster, so she decides to save him, take care of him, and raise him.

programme.title: Men El Qalb Lel Qalb
programme.desc: A social program that talks about topics related to charitable work and invites viewers to participate through social media.

programme.title: Qanon Omar
programme.desc: A mechanical engineer called Omar, who works in a maintenance center is in love with the daughter of the owner. He gets involved in a big accident that gets him imprisoned. Nevertheless he manages to escape and begins a journey to prove his innocence.

programme.title: Vanshaj
programme.desc: Yuvika disagrees with her family over giving the inheritance of the family business to male members and demands selecting the successor per their qualifications.

programme.title: Ekhtefaa
programme.desc: A university professor lives in Russia with her husband. When he suddenly disappears, she goes on a journey to find him. As her search takes her to Egypt, she finds out things that she had never known before.

programme.title: Lami El Ott
programme.desc: The serial revolves around a bus driver (Muhammad Imam) in a private school. As the driver returns home after school ends, a parent kidnaps the school bus and asks for a ransom.

programme.title: Al Thaman
programme.desc: The widow Sarah resorts to her only remaining option to cover the costs of her son Ibrahims cancer treatment, so she agrees to spend one night with the manager of the company, Zain, in return for an amount of money.

programme.title: Ragel w Set Setat 2
programme.desc: As Adel and Ranias 9th wedding anniversary looms closer, the couple dreams of having their own house that isnt occupied by their family, but all their plans to achieve their dream amount to nothing, leaving the family to go through new adventures in separate-connected episodes.

programme.title: Ya Massa El Anwar
programme.desc: A daily sports program that reviews the most important football issues, topics, and news. It also hosts many players and coaches, who analyze the most important local and international matches in a special behind-the-scenes setting.

programme.title: Sittat Bayt Al Maadi
programme.desc: As three married women, Maryam, Sherihan, and Radwa, live in the same house but in different eras, they are forced to make similar decisions in order to deal with the challenges of their marriages and after discovering the infidelity of their husbands.

programme.title: Aelat Al-Hajj Noaman 2
programme.desc: In the second part, 25 years pass after Khalids death, his son, whom Khalid refused to acknowledge, appears. He starts to claim his rights and avenge his mother, who was wronged by his father.

programme.title: Family Secrets
programme.desc: It follows a lawyer and a prosecutor who must work together to investigate a murder to find the killer, which creates an irreversible breaking point in their lives.

programme.title: Etneen Fel Sandoq
programme.desc: The twin brothers Shawqy and Zika wish to change their lives for the better, as Shawqy wants to become an actor and Zika a singer. They pursue their lovers and their dreams, but their job as garbage men stands in the way. All while Mamado, the leader of Zambizy, learns he has twin children in Egypt.

programme.title: Sok Ala Ikhwatak
programme.desc: A young mans life is completely changed when he inherits a great fortune and learns that he has sisters he hasnt met before. Many funny situations occur as he starts his new life.

programme.title: Haqq Arab
programme.desc: Arab seeks to escape from a bitter past, but this past casts its shadow over him from time to time, so he finds no way other than confronting it.

programme.title: Etneen Fel Sandoq
programme.desc: The twin brothers Shawqy and Zika wish to change their lives for the better, as Shawqy wants to become an actor and Zika a singer. They pursue their lovers and their dreams, but their job as garbage men stands in the way. All while Mamado, the leader of Zambizy, learns he has twin children in Egypt.

programme.title: Sok Ala Ikhwatak
programme.desc: A young mans life is completely changed when he inherits a great fortune and learns that he has sisters he hasnt met before. Many funny situations occur as he starts his new life.

programme.title: Haqq Arab
programme.desc: Arab seeks to escape from a bitter past, but this past casts its shadow over him from time to time, so he finds no way other than confronting it.

programme.title: Sittat Bayt Al Maadi
programme.desc: As three married women, Maryam, Sherihan, and Radwa, live in the same house but in different eras, they are forced to make similar decisions in order to deal with the challenges of their marriages and after discovering the infidelity of their husbands.

programme.title: Family Secrets
programme.desc: It follows a lawyer and a prosecutor who must work together to investigate a murder to find the killer, which creates an irreversible breaking point in their lives.
