programme.title: Sok Ala Ikhwatak
programme.desc: A young mans life is completely changed when he inherits a great fortune and learns that he has sisters he hasnt met before. Many funny situations occur as he starts his new life.

programme.title: Runaway Jury
programme.desc: As a young widow takes a gun manufacturer to court, the trial turns into a three-way struggle to control the verdict. Between the prosecution, the defense and its jury consultant, and one of the jurors, the attempt to sway the jury becomes a game of wits.

programme.title: Acrimony
programme.desc: Melinda is an honest and faithful wife, who decides to turn things against her cheating husband, after confirming his unfaithfulness.

programme.title: Brian Banks
programme.desc: The true story of how Brian Banks, a high school football star with a bright future, got wrongly convicted of rape and fought to prove his innocence after getting released from prison so that he could pursue his dream of playing in the NFL.

programme.title: The Best of Enemies
programme.desc: The story of how an unlikely friendship formed between black activist Ann Atwater and local Ku Klux Klan leader CP Ellis, after they are forced to co-chair a meeting to discuss desegregation of schools after a black school burns down.

programme.title: Stone
programme.desc: Gerald “ Stone” Creeson (Edward Norton) is a convicted arsonist who is spending time in prison. Desperate to get out, Stone has his wife Lucetta (Milla Jovovich) seduce his parole officer Jack Mabrey (Robert De Niro).Stone is playing a dangerous game as his attempts at psychological manipulation could conceivably backfire at any moment – so is the gamble worth the prize?

programme.title: The Mortal Instruments: City of Bones
programme.desc: The story follows Clary Fray, a teenager who learns that she has inherited her mother’s power to slay demons. After her mother disappears, she joins other Shadow Hunters like herself. As she learns more of their secrets, she is forced to make difficult decisions that could cost her her life.

programme.title: Jumanji: Welcome to the Jungle
programme.desc: Four youngsters are trapped in the Jumanji jungle world as their avatars when they use a magical video game to play, and they have to complete the game to get back to reality.

programme.title: Spider-Man: Homecoming
programme.desc: With Tony Stark keeping an eye on him, Peter struggles to live up to his mantle as a superhero and reconcile the responsibility with his ordinary life as a high school student. But when a new villain appears with advanced weapons, Peter has to face a threat to everything he holds dear.

programme.title: Acrimony
programme.desc: Melinda is an honest and faithful wife, who decides to turn things against her cheating husband, after confirming his unfaithfulness.

programme.title: The Best of Enemies
programme.desc: The story of how an unlikely friendship formed between black activist Ann Atwater and local Ku Klux Klan leader CP Ellis, after they are forced to co-chair a meeting to discuss desegregation of schools after a black school burns down.

programme.title: The High Note
programme.desc: A famous singer and her hardworking assistant try to make a difficult choice, which could change the course of their careers forever.

programme.title: Marry Me
programme.desc: As the celebrity power couple Kat Valdez and Bastian are getting ready to wed before a global audience of fans, things take a surprising turn when Kat finds out that Bastian cheated on her, so she chooses a stranger from the crowd named Charlie to marry instead.

programme.title: Teen Spirit
programme.desc: Violet is an introverted teenager who lives in a small town and dreams of becoming a star. With the help of an unlikely mentor, she enters a local singing competition that will test her own abilities.

programme.title: Hollywood Buzz
programme.desc: The program reviews the latest news and developments about films, interviews with new stars, and fashion in the American film capital.

programme.title: Pitch Perfect
programme.desc: Beca, a freshman at Barden University, reluctantly joins The Bellas, the schools female acapella group. Beca shakes up the groups tired repertoire with some fresh ideas and leads the group to nationals, where they take on their crowd-pleasing male rivals.

programme.title: Step Up All In
programme.desc: After his team leaves him behind, Sean catches wind of a dance competition that could change everything for him. He sets out to create a new team, recruiting faces old and new, only to discover that he will be facing off against his old team in the competition.

programme.title: Runaway Jury
programme.desc: As a young widow takes a gun manufacturer to court, the trial turns into a three-way struggle to control the verdict. Between the prosecution, the defense and its jury consultant, and one of the jurors, the attempt to sway the jury becomes a game of wits.

programme.title: Brian Banks
programme.desc: The true story of how Brian Banks, a high school football star with a bright future, got wrongly convicted of rape and fought to prove his innocence after getting released from prison so that he could pursue his dream of playing in the NFL.

programme.title: Men of Honor
programme.desc: The true story of how Carl Brashear became the first black American Navy diver despite the rampant racism and his commanding officers insistence to see him fail, and how he inspired a change of heart in his master chief who eventually became one of his biggest allies.

programme.title: Spider-Man: Far From Home
programme.desc: Peter Parker and his friends go on a summer break to Europe, where Peter finds himself trying to save his friends from the evil hands of Mysterio.

programme.title: Step Up All In
programme.desc: After his team leaves him behind, Sean catches wind of a dance competition that could change everything for him. He sets out to create a new team, recruiting faces old and new, only to discover that he will be facing off against his old team in the competition.

programme.title: Pitch Perfect
programme.desc: Beca, a freshman at Barden University, reluctantly joins The Bellas, the schools female acapella group. Beca shakes up the groups tired repertoire with some fresh ideas and leads the group to nationals, where they take on their crowd-pleasing male rivals.

programme.title: Old Man and the Gun
programme.desc: The true story of Forrest Tucker, who escaped prison and made the police force chase their tails for a long time, trying to catch him after executing a number of incredible heists, at the age of 70!

programme.title: Dreamland
programme.desc: As the Great Depression leaves its mark across America, a teenager stumbles upon an injured bank robber, forcing him to make a choice between helping the seductive robber, or turning her in to get the reward for her arrest.

programme.title: Hell or High Water
programme.desc: A divorced father and his ex-con brother start a series of bank robberies to keep their familys ranch in West Texas, while two Texas Rangers try to catch them.

programme.title: Hakim Basha
programme.desc: As Hakim works in excavating and trading in antiquities, his uncle puts all the family’s property in his hands due to his intelligence and his supporting him in managing his business. He then becomes the patriarch of the family and controls its affairs, but his enemies soon multiply, and conspiracies surround him from every direction, even from those closest to him.

programme.title: Saif 99
programme.desc: The series highlights a multi-generational Gulf family living under one roof, as their emotional and social conflicts intersect as well as their differences between the past and the present, revealing challenges and secrets that conceal many hidden issues beneath their apparent cohesion.

programme.title: The Office
programme.desc: In the series, Hannah Howard, the managing director of a corporation, strives to keep her staff together despite getting into difficulties after finding out that her branch will be closing and that remote work will be the new norm.

programme.title: Salma
programme.desc: Salma is a young mother facing life by herself after her husband, Jalal, disappears under mysterious circumstances. She finds herself forced to raise her two children amidst poverty, trauma, and loneliness, as her journey embodies a deeply human example of the suffering of Arab mothers who face the harshness of life with steadfastness.

programme.title: Akhbar MBC
programme.desc: The MBC networks news bulletin works around the clock to cover all news and events in various fields, displaying their various details and developments from all aspects.

programme.title: Studio 22
programme.desc: After going bankrupt, a TV station is bought by a businessman called Wahid, which comes as a surprise for the employees. As Wahid takes over management along with his secretary Lahib, rivalry and jealousy arise among everyone to prove themselves.

programme.title: Lesh La
programme.desc: An entertainment program presented by four Saudi YouTubers who use their followers to make a list of the 100 best wishes to come true.

programme.title: Safar Barlik
programme.desc: Set when the Ottoman Sultan ordered every one of military age in all areas under Ottoman control at the time to serve in the military, four young men are all working toward the same goal of independence.

programme.desc: In the series, Hannah Howard, the managing director of a corporation, strives to keep her staff together despite getting into difficulties after finding out that her branch will be closing and that remote work will be the new norm.

programme.desc: Officer Musa exploits his power to achieve personal gain in corrupt and twisted ways, which puts him in direct confrontation with the people he is blackmailing, while he discovers that his two siblings are counterfeiting dollars, and he finds himself in a difficult dilemma, torn between leaving them to confront the gangs alone, or managing this business himself to protect them.

programme.title: 90 Daqiqa
programme.desc: In 2006, Riham El Sahly and Moataz Al Demerdash hosted one of the most significant talk shows. In 2011, journalist Amr Al Laithy replaced Al Demerdash on the show. programme.title: Be 100 Ragel
programme.desc: The events revolve around Ghalia Abu Al Dahab, who faces challenges and troubles in her life. She is a woman from a poor area who was forced by circumstances to work as a microbus driver after the death of her husband

programme.title: Forbidden Apple
programme.desc: The events highlight the world of businessmen and extreme wealth, the conflict created by love on the one hand, and the control of money over people on the other.

programme.title: Karadayi
programme.desc: After Nazif Kara is wrongfully accused of a murder he didnt commit, the Kara familys lives turn upside down, as his son fights to get his father out of jail.

programme.title: El-Soltana Kosom
programme.desc: The series unfolds the story of the sultan Kosem, in a historical context. Where events take place during the seventeenth century since the beginning of Sultan Ahmed I reign of the Ottoman throne, and the origins of the Sultan Kosem and her rise to the Sultans Palace and how she got chosen from among the maids, and control the Ottoman authority and its management.

programme.title: Love and Punishment
programme.desc: When love is connected to customs and traditions and collides with them, what will the sacrifice be like?. Can the lover sacrifice their love and marry someone they do not love, or will the sacrifice be of the entire clan in order to achieve their goal? What will be the themes of the story of Savas and Yasemin?

programme.title: You Knock on My Door
programme.desc: All of Edas hopes are to complete her studies until she receives an offer from Serkan Bolat, who promises to help her get her scholarship in exchange for pretending to be his fiancee for two months.

programme.desc: All of Edas hopes are to complete her studies until she receives an offer from Serkan Bolat, who promises to help her get her scholarship in exchange for pretending to be his fiancee for two months.

programme.title: Forbidden Apple
programme.desc: The events highlight the world of businessmen and extreme wealth, the conflict created by love on the one hand, and the control of money over people on the other.

programme.title: El-Soltana Kosom
programme.desc: The series unfolds the story of the sultan Kosem, in a historical context. Where events take place during the seventeenth century since the beginning of Sultan Ahmed I reign of the Ottoman throne, and the origins of the Sultan Kosem and her rise to the Sultans Palace and how she got chosen from among the maids, and control the Ottoman authority and its management.

programme.title: Love and Punishment
programme.desc: When love is connected to customs and traditions and collides with them, what will the sacrifice be like?. Can the lover sacrifice their love and marry someone they do not love, or will the sacrifice be of the entire clan in order to achieve their goal? What will be the themes of the story of Savas and Yasemin?

programme.title: Be 100 Ragel
programme.desc: The events revolve around Ghalia Abu Al Dahab, who faces challenges and troubles in her life. She is a woman from a poor area who was forced by circumstances to work as a microbus driver after the death of her husband

programme.title: Jodha Akbar
programme.desc: The story revolves around the marriage of the Rajput princess, Jodha, and the Mughal Emperor, Akbar, in sixteenth-century India. The primary purpose of the marriage is to avoid conflict between Indias two biggest religions, but it quickly develops into a romantic tale between the emperor and the princess that helps to alter the course of the nation.

programme.title: Broken Pieces S1
programme.desc: When a nurse mistakes two new-born baby girls with one another due to their similar names, she switches them, causing the rich family to get the poor baby, and the poor family to get the rich baby. Fifteen years after the switch, the secret is revealed.

programme.title: Al-Rayyan
programme.desc: The story of the famous businessman, Ahmed Al-Rayyan, who was a source of major controversy during the eighties after he was indicted for Ponzi schemes and sentenced to 23 years in prison.

programme.title: Life Song
programme.desc: Beyram returns to his native Istanbul to reconcile with his close friend, and they agree to marry their children Kerim and Melek when they grow up. Kerim grew up in Germany; but his father forces him to return and marry Melek, but Hulya, Meleks younger sister, wants to marry him.

programme.title: Assassination Games
programme.desc: Seeking revenge for the attack that left his wife comatose, the assassin Roland Flint teams up with a rival assassin, Vincent Brazil, as they combine their talents to eliminate a target, but their mission gets more complicated considering their target has some Interpol agents on the payroll.

programme.desc: The events revolve around a smart thirteen-year-old boy named Ekans, who acquires a supernatural power that gives him the ability to control snakes. Using modern technology, he is able to confront villains and keep his city safe.

programme.title: The Powerpuff Girls

programme.title: Arees Delivery
programme.desc: When his parents die and leave him with nothing, Niyazi falls for the daughter of one of dads employees. At the same time, he meets the daughter of the businesswoman whose hotel he works at. The businesswoman does all she can to get him away from her daughter.

programme.title: Aleisyan 1
programme.desc: A social drama about the interrelated human relations between members of the same family, especially when theyre exposed to the temptation of money and how it can spoil the soul to the extent that makes a son covet his fathers money and interdict him under pressure from his wife.

programme.title: Al Hafaar
programme.desc: As the Israeli forces occupy Sinai prior to the War of Attrition, they use an excavator to dig deep in the land, under the pretext theyre searching for oil. When the Egyptian authorities discover their true intentions, they try to stop the excavator from reaching Bab El-Mendab.

programme.title: Flash
programme.desc: An art program presenting most recent news about artists and their most recent appearances in films, plays and television series, and also includes a segment dedicated to interviewing stars on the phone.

programme.title: A Very Rich Poor Man
programme.desc: The events revolve around a man who becomes a billionaire. Initially believing that he possessed the world, he discovers that he is very poor because he lacks peace of mind and reassurance.

programme.title: Inhiraf
programme.desc: Based on a true story; the plot tackles the moral deviation of a number of characters who fall in the hands of a psychiatrist who decides to adjust their lives in her own way.

programme.title: kalam regala
programme.desc: The series recounts the stories of several women, including the working woman, the society lady, the wife of an official, and the wife of a corrupt lawyer. What they share in common is their husbands absence from the scene, leaving them to struggle their way through life by consulting one another.

programme.title: Flash
programme.desc: An art program presenting most recent news about artists and their most recent appearances in films, plays and television series, and also includes a segment dedicated to interviewing stars on the phone.

programme.title: Fe Ghamdet Ein
programme.desc: Fatma and Nabila are two friends, raised together in an orphanage until they work as supervisors in the same place. Suffering from the cruelty of life, until Nabila discovers that she has a wealthy uncle and goes to see him. On the way, an accident happens and her friend thinks that she died.

programme.title: Asmahan
programme.desc: The story of the late singer Asmahan, from her birth to her move from Beirut to Cairo to work as a singer and an actress to her mysterious death. The series covers her relationship with some of her contemporaries and how she got famous along with her brother, Farid Al-Atrash

programme.title: Sherif w nos 1
programme.desc: In a separate connected episodes, the series revolve around the life of an Egyptian family, as Emad marries a foreigner who leaves the country, so he leaves his son, Sherif Jr., with his uncle Rashad and his cousin Sherif, as a series of comedic situations take place while they look after the child.

programme.title: Masaa Alfan
programme.desc: An artistic program that presents the most important news and issues related to the artistic scene and its stars. The program also shows their artistic journeys and tracks their upcoming works.

programme.title: Al Ameel 1001
programme.desc: The story of the Egyptian young spy Amr Tolba who was able to infiltrate both the Israeli army and society in a successful operation before the 1973 War. When Musa, a young Jewish man in Tanta dies, his resemblance to Amr is used to recruit Amr and plant him in Israel.

programme.title: Al Sayad
programme.desc: After a debilitating accident, a member of one of the security services is deemed unfit for duty and gets fired. But when his former colleagues confront a puzzling case, they are forced to call upon him to help solve the mystery.

programme.title: Naharuk Saeid
programme.desc: A morning show on the Nile Life channel that addresses public problems and sheds light on a range of social and societal issues, all the while inviting specialists in the fields he discusses to provide their professional opinions. It also makes an effort to involve every family member in current affairs.

programme.title: Al Sayad

programme.title: Bassant and Diyasty S1
programme.desc: A continuation of four previous parts, revolving around the constant struggle between technological development and the simplicity of the villagers in an interesting comic context, through the characters of Bassant and Diyasty.

programme.title: Adam wa Jamila
programme.desc: After losing her parents, Jamila (Yousra Al-Lozy) lives with her uncles family. Then she meets him again by chance, but they have to face their parents greed and obsession.

programme.desc: A weekly program that broadcasts Egyptian and international news via video reports. It also looks at the most popular websites about art and artists.

programme.title: Qalae Al Hajar
programme.desc: The series is set in Upper Egypt and is based on a true event in which the tyrannical parents of Abdul Hayy, a rebellious young man, force him to face several difficulties. The work also addresses the issue of women’s rights.

programme.title: Al Dawama
programme.desc: Taking place during the 1920s and 1930s in Kuwait; Fahd returns with the news of the death of his lifelong friend Saud, and Abu Mejbal suspects Fahd’s involvement in the matter, and insists on searching for the truth, while Rashid returns from India and reveals something that was not expected.

programme.title: Tajir Al-Saada
programme.desc: In spite of not completing his studies in Al Azhar, the blind ring seller Misbah knows how to handle people and fix their problems. Allegedly, he is a man of "miracles" and the people of his neighborhood rally around him to be touched by his blessings.

programme.title: Hekayti
programme.desc: The story of Dalida (Yasmeen Sabri) who comes from a traumatic childhood, as she travels and faces the challenges of life and love.

programme.title: Haddouta Manseya
programme.desc: It deals with the story of Souad, who raises her husband’s children and takes care of them after his death. However, her brother Khairat comes out of prison and decides to take revenge on her and return the diamond necklace that Souad hid. He devises a plan to ambush her husband’s children in the hope of achieving his revenge.

programme.title: Zai El Qamar 2
programme.desc: The series comprises many stories, such as Ghalias Tale, which follows Ghalia, a girl who plays and studies music and has an unorthodox, late marriage. Theres also the story One Percent, which follows a blind woman who goes through many difficult situations, in addition to many other social tales.

programme.title: Teta Zuzu
programme.desc: It follows the widowed grandmother Zuzu, who used to work in agriculture and has two sons and two daughters. We follow her relationship with her grandchildren and the problems they face, while she uses AI to keep pace with the developments happening around her, and her falling into the clutches of the corrupt businessman Al Bahrawi.

programme.title: Ard El-Nefaaq
programme.desc: Masouds income is low and his life is miserable, he always fights with his wife Gamila and his mother-in-law, and his father owns a couscous shop. He meets Dr. Madi who offers him ethics for sale in the form of pills, he begins to take them to discover a new life and new characters.

programme.title: Leabet Newton
programme.desc: The two lovers, Hazem and Hana, decide to have their baby in America to get the nationality. However, they come across many obstacles that threaten their marriage, especially when Hana stays in America and does not come back.

programme.title: Hekayti
programme.desc: The story of Dalida (Yasmeen Sabri) who comes from a traumatic childhood, as she travels and faces the challenges of life and love.

programme.title: The Pit S2
programme.desc: In the second chapter, Yamaç and his family decide to go on a new path of revenge and wrath in the city after Cumalis previous experiences with the Black Lambs.

programme.title: Falling Leaves S4
programme.desc: Alis family rents an apartment after selling the mansion, but it later burns down. Ferhunde accuses Sevket of arson. Disagreements break out between Jaida and Oguz. Meanwhile, Ali suffers a heart attack after Sevket is arrested on charges of murder.

programme.title: Raven
programme.desc: Kuzguns familys life is completely changed due to the conflict between the father and the son, and the family falls into a 20-year tragedy of pain, despair, and hatred.

programme.title: Love for Rent S2
programme.desc: In season two, Neriman tries to fix things with Omer, and Koray, who left the company and opened a store, tries to beg Omer to let him return to the company, while the latter tries to get things back on track in the company.

programme.title: Resurrection: Ertugrul S1
programme.desc: While Ertugrul goes out hunting with his men, he rescues Halime Hatun, her father and her brother from the Templars, and brings them to the headquarters of the Kayi tribe, causing the anger of the Templars. The Kayi decide to migrate to Aleppo due to drought. Ertugrul travels with his men to meet the Emir of Aleppo to give them an area to settle in.

programme.title: The Finest Hours
programme.desc: In February of 1952 New England, a huge storm hit the East Coast , damaging an oil tanker off the coast of Cape Cod and ripping it in half. On a small lifeboat four members of the Coast Guard set out on an impossible mission to rescue more than 30 stranded sailors trapped aboard the sinking vessel.

programme.title: John Wick: Chapter 3 - Parabellum
programme.desc: In this sequel, John Wick has killed a member of the High Table, a shadowy international assassins guild, deeming him an excommunicado (excluded member) and raising a US$ 14 million price tag for his head. A whole world of ruthless hit men and women are pursuing him around every corner.

programme.title: Avengers: Age of Ultron
programme.desc: When the Avengers raid a Hydra facility in Eastern European Sokovia and confiscate Lokis scepter from its commander, Tony Stark uses the scepters gem to complete "Ultron", a global defense program. Ultron gains artificial ingelligence from the gem and believes he must eradicate humanity to save Earth. The Avengers must face evolving Ultron, his robot army and the Scarlet Witch to save humanity.

programme.title: Bereavement
programme.desc: When 6-year-old Martin Bristol is abducted by the psychotic serial-killer Graham Sutter, hes forced to bear witness to his horrific crimes. Five years later, the teenager Allison stumbles upon the farmhouse where Martin is kept.

programme.title: Safe House
programme.desc: Ex-CIA agent Tobin Frost turns out to be an international criminal. He enters an American consulate and gets moved to a CIA safe house in Cape Town, South Africa. The "housekeeper" of this safe house is agent Matt Weston (Ryan Reynolds) who escapes with Frost when the house got attacked. They must stay out of the gunmens sight until they get to another safe house.

programme.title: The Finest Hours
programme.desc: In February of 1952 New England, a huge storm hit the East Coast , damaging an oil tanker off the coast of Cape Cod and ripping it in half. On a small lifeboat four members of the Coast Guard set out on an impossible mission to rescue more than 30 stranded sailors trapped aboard the sinking vessel.

programme.title: Street Kings
programme.desc: Tom Ludlow is an undercover cop who is involved in the murder of an officer. Ludlow gets into many troubles as he tries to clear his name.

programme.title: John Wick: Chapter 3 - Parabellum
programme.desc: In this sequel, John Wick has killed a member of the High Table, a shadowy international assassins guild, deeming him an excommunicado (excluded member) and raising a US$ 14 million price tag for his head. A whole world of ruthless hit men and women are pursuing him around every corner.

programme.title: Avengers: Age of Ultron
programme.desc: When the Avengers raid a Hydra facility in Eastern European Sokovia and confiscate Lokis scepter from its commander, Tony Stark uses the scepters gem to complete "Ultron", a global defense program. Ultron gains artificial ingelligence from the gem and believes he must eradicate humanity to save Earth. The Avengers must face evolving Ultron, his robot army and the Scarlet Witch to save humanity.

programme.title: 2 Broke Girls S2
programme.desc: In the second season, the two waitresses, Max and Caroline, try together to take the next step in their dream of opening their own cupcake business.

programme.title: The Big Bang Theory S3
programme.desc: Penny, a pretty woman coming from Omaha to California as an aspiring actress. She moves into the apartment across the hall from Leonard Hofstadter and Sheldon Cooper. Leonard and Sheldon are both brilliant Physicists. Colleagues, best friends and roommates Leonard and Sheldon have a relationship that is being continuously tested by Sheldons deeply eccentric and non-convential attitude. Theyre also friends with their colleagues mechanical engineer Howard Wolowitz and astrophysicist Rajesh Koothrappali. With Penny moving across the hall, Leonard has a new aspiration in life besides physics.

Lego Jurassic World: Legend of Isla Nublar
programme.desc: At Jurassic Park, a velociraptor handler and an operations manager respond to massive problems while trying to prevent dinosaur-sized disasters.

programme.title: Red Dawn
programme.desc: As WWIII breaks out, a town in Colorado is invaded by Soviet forces, forcing a number of teenagers to go into the mountains to escape the advancing invasion. As the town falls to the Soviets, the teenagers arrange themselves into a resisting force that engages the invaders.

programme.title: Batman and Robin
programme.desc: With the working relationship between Batman and Robin on the rocks, the two struggle to put aside their differences to face off against Mr. Freeze and Poison Ivy, the latter of whom stokes the tension between the superhero duo.

programme.title: Assassins Creed
programme.desc: With the aid of a technology that gives him access to his ancestors memories through genetics, Callum takes a dive into the memories of his ancestor Aguilar, a member of the Assassins, to figure out a way to prevent the Templars from stripping people of their free will.

programme.title: Underworld
programme.desc: Selene is a beautiful vampire hunter, in the middle of a war between vampires and werewolves. Even though she gets along with vampire, she falls in love with Michael, the werewolf.

programme.title: Death Wish II
programme.desc: After Paul Kersey relocates to Los Angeles with his daughter who is suffering from trauma, things take a dark turn as vicious thugs murder the girl, upon which Kersey decides to take the law into his own hands.

programme.title: Assassins Creed
programme.desc: With the aid of a technology that gives him access to his ancestors memories through genetics, Callum takes a dive into the memories of his ancestor Aguilar, a member of the Assassins, to figure out a way to prevent the Templars from stripping people of their free will.

programme.title: The Lake House
programme.desc: An epic love story between two people who have lived at the same lakeside house, as they exchange letters without seeing each other until they discover a shocking surprise.

programme.title: Ronin
programme.desc: The Irish lady, Deirdre, forms a team of specialized mercenaries to retrieve a mysterious suitcase from dangerous criminals. After they successfully complete the mission, the suitcase gets switched by a member of the team who wants to sell it to the Russians.

programme.title: Red Dawn
programme.desc: As WWIII breaks out, a town in Colorado is invaded by Soviet forces, forcing a number of teenagers to go into the mountains to escape the advancing invasion. As the town falls to the Soviets, the teenagers arrange themselves into a resisting force that engages the invaders.

programme.title: Batman and Robin
programme.desc: With the working relationship between Batman and Robin on the rocks, the two struggle to put aside their differences to face off against Mr. Freeze and Poison Ivy, the latter of whom stokes the tension between the superhero duo.

programme.title: Assassins Creed
programme.desc: With the aid of a technology that gives him access to his ancestors memories through genetics, Callum takes a dive into the memories of his ancestor Aguilar, a member of the Assassins, to figure out a way to prevent the Templars from stripping people of their free will.

programme.title: Batman v Superman: Dawn of Justice
programme.desc: After his battle in Metropolis, Bruce Wayne believes that Superman must be stopped, as the evil Lex Luthor manipulates Batman into defeating the Man of Steel.

programme.title: Justice League
programme.desc: After his restored faith in humanity and his inspiration from Superman’s neglect of himself, Batman unites with Princess Diana to defeat the strong villain.

programme.title: Aquaman
programme.desc: Born to a human father and an Atlantean mother, Arthur Curry is forced to step into his role as heir to Atlantis to prevent war from breaking out between the two worlds he belongs to.

programme.title: Daredevil
programme.desc: Matt Murdock is a blind lawyer who has a secret identity; as he fights criminals at courtrooms by day, hes the masked vigilante Daredevil by night. He vows to fight crime and faces off against a criminal leader known as the Kingpin.

programme.title: Death Wish 3
programme.desc: Paul Kersey returns to New York City, only to face a terrifying reality, which is criminal gangs taking over the neighborhoods. He is forced to engage in a gang war by a corrupt police chief, who sees him as a tool to implement his suspicious plans.

programme.title: Daredevil
programme.desc: Matt Murdock is a blind lawyer who has a secret identity; as he fights criminals at courtrooms by day, hes the masked vigilante Daredevil by night. He vows to fight crime and faces off against a criminal leader known as the Kingpin.

programme.title: Blood Diamond
programme.desc: In Sierra Leone, Solomon Vandy is separated from his family and forced to work in mines, where he finds a diamond and hides it. When hes arrested, he meets Danny Archer the arms trafficker, who offers to help him find his family in exchange for the priceless diamond.

programme.title: Batman v Superman: Dawn of Justice
programme.desc: After his battle in Metropolis, Bruce Wayne believes that Superman must be stopped, as the evil Lex Luthor manipulates Batman into defeating the Man of Steel.

programme.title: Justice League
programme.desc: After his restored faith in humanity and his inspiration from Superman’s neglect of himself, Batman unites with Princess Diana to defeat the strong villain.

programme.title: Blood Diamond
programme.desc: In Sierra Leone, Solomon Vandy is separated from his family and forced to work in mines, where he finds a diamond and hides it. When hes arrested, he meets Danny Archer the arms trafficker, who offers to help him find his family in exchange for the priceless diamond.

programme.title: Daredevil
programme.desc: Matt Murdock is a blind lawyer who has a secret identity; as he fights criminals at courtrooms by day, hes the masked vigilante Daredevil by night. He vows to fight crime and faces off against a criminal leader known as the Kingpin.

programme.title: Age of Heroes
programme.desc: The story depicts the actual events leading up to the creation of Ian Flemings 30 Commando regiment, which preceded the elite British military units.

programme.title: The Accountant
programme.desc: A brilliant accountant moonlighting as an assassin helps facilitate the work of illicit outlaws.

programme.title: Retribution
programme.desc: A bank executive on his way to drop off his kids at school discovers a bomb inside his car and must drive it without stopping or calling for help to avoid detonating the bomb.

programme.title: Valentines Day
programme.desc: Set on Valentines Day, the story follows the interwoven lives of couples as well as single people as they go through this highly anticipated and greatly dreaded day.

programme.title: Father Figures
programme.desc: After their mother reveals to them that their father is still alive, the fraternal twins Kyle and Peter embark on a wild journey to find him.

programme.title: Lady Bird
programme.desc: The coming of age story of Christina, a seventeen year old high school student, about to graduate from her catholic school, and is anticipating the journey and adventures to come.

programme.title: One for the Money
programme.desc: Stephanie Plum (Katherine Heigl) loses her job, and works with her cousin Finney as a bounty hunter . Her first case is to find officer Joe Morelli (Jason OMara), whos accused of murder but she faces obstacles because of his skills . During her search, she believes that hes innocent and tries to prove it.

programme.title: The Rebound
programme.desc: A single mother moves to the city with her two kids after discovering that her husband cheated on her. She befriends her younger neighbor, as he becomes exactly what she needs.

programme.title: CHIPS
programme.desc: Frank Poncherello, an undercover federal agent, and Jon Baker, a rookie, join the highway patrol in California for entirely different reasons. They team up and roam around putting a stop to speeding cars and vehicle thefts, helping those who are lost, and investigating crimes.

programme.title: Ted
programme.desc: John received Teddy, a stuffed bear, on his birthday when he was a little boy, and wished that he would become alive. Now, he has to maintain the balance between his relationship with Ted, and his relationship with his girlfriend, Lori.

programme.title: Sisters
programme.desc: With their childhood home put up for sale, sisters Maura and Kate reunite for one last hurrah at the place that witnessed their glory days. Deciding to throw a party for their old high school friends, things quickly spin out of control as old rivalries and new conflicts rise to the surface.

programme.title: Last Christmas
programme.desc: Kates life in an unmitigated mess. Despite her dreams of being a singer, she finds herself stuck working as an elf in a year-round Christmas shop. But Kates life starts to look up when Tom enters her life. Perhaps he can put an end to her string of bad decisions.

programme.title: 17 Again
programme.desc: Dissatisfied with the course his life has taken, the middle-aged Mike wishes he could go back in time to make some changes to it. As he wakes up one day, he discovers that his wish has been fulfilled and that he is now 17 again.

programme.title: Father Figures
programme.desc: After their mother reveals to them that their father is still alive, the fraternal twins Kyle and Peter embark on a wild journey to find him.

programme.title: Lady Bird
programme.desc: The coming of age story of Christina, a seventeen year old high school student, about to graduate from her catholic school, and is anticipating the journey and adventures to come.

programme.title: Crazy Stupid Love
programme.desc: When his seemingly perfect life with his wife starts showing its cracks, Cal is left adrift in the face of their impending divorce. His newfound friend Jacob tries to help him get over his loneliness and get back in the dating scene by being his wingman as he tries to pick up girls at bars.

programme.title: Ride Along
programme.desc: As a way to prove himself worthy of marrying Angela, James sister, security guard Ben joins her cop brother on a day long patrol of Atlanta.

programme.title: Ride Along 2
programme.desc: James and Ben team up again for a second Ride Along film.James and Ben team up again for a second Ride Along, and try to bust some drug dealing operations in Miami, before Ben’s wedding to James’ sister.

programme.title: Last Love
programme.desc: An elderly widow, Matthew, finds solace in Pauline, a bright young dance instructor who sticks by his side and brightens his world. But when his estranged children arrive, the bond between Matthew and Pauline are put to the test as the formers children grow suspicious of Pauline.

programme.title: Daphne and Velma
programme.desc: A look into the development of Velma and Daphnes friendship before meeting Scooby and the gang. When Daphne transfers to Velmas school, the two unite to solve the mystery of their classmates disappearance and reappearance in a zombified state.

programme.title: How to Lose Friends and Alienate People
programme.desc: Torn by his conflicting feelings about fame and celebrities, the journalist Sidney gets a once-in-a-lifetime opportunity when he is offered a job with a NY-based, high-profile magazine. But his attempt to get close to the celebrities he covers and to his own boss has unforeseen consequences.

programme.title: The Change Up
programme.desc: A comedy about best friends Mitch and Dave who grow apart as their lives take different paths. When the two simultaneously wish to swap lives, things get complicated as their wish comes true, landing them in the shoes of each other, quite literally.

programme.title: Drive-Away Dolls
programme.desc: In quest of a new beginning, two ladies take an unexpected road trip to Tallahassee, Florida. Things immediately go wrong when they come across a bunch of unskilled criminals along the road.

programme.title: Ted 2
programme.desc: Ted and Tami-Lynns plan to have a baby hits a major snag when the court refuses to recognize Ted, who is a teddy bear, as a person. With his best friend Johns help, Ted embarks on a journey to sway the ruling of the law in order to have a family with his beloved.

programme.title: Half Baked: Totally High
programme.desc: Three stoners try to sell a magical form of marijuana in Los Angeles, aiming to raise money for their friends funeral, but they soon find themselves in deep trouble when their operation attracts the wrath of a dangerous drug lord.

programme.title: Last Love

programme.title: Valentines Day
programme.desc: Set on Valentines Day, the story follows the interwoven lives of couples as well as single people as they go through this highly anticipated and greatly dreaded day.

programme.title: Desperately Seeking Susan
programme.desc: After she becomes fascinated by an ad in the personal columns about a woman named Susan, the bored housewife Roberta sets out on an adventure in New York to find her, but she soon finds herself caught in a lot of trouble.

programme.title: Leap Year
programme.desc: Anna Bradys plans to invoke an old Irish tradition, where a man has to accept a marriage proposal if its made on leap day, to ensure that her boyfriend says yes to her proposal, but her plan is derailed by bad weather and an infuriating innkeeper.

programme.desc: Bill has once been a successful coach, but his alcohol problems cut his career short and ruined his future. When life is generous enough to give him a second chance at redemption by training a school girls basketball team, will he get things right this time?

programme.desc: Charlie leads a happy life with his family, despite living in poverty. He dreams of winning a golden ticket that would give him a chance to visit the mysterious Willy Wonka factory. His dream comes true and he gets the chance to go with his grandfather on an exciting tour of the factory, led by Mr. Wonka himself.

programme.title: Shrek the Third
programme.desc: When his father in-law -King Harold - falls sick, Shrek becomes the future heir to the land of Far, Far Away. programme.desc: As Hiccup fulfills his dream of creating a peaceful dragon utopia, Toothless discovery of a wild dragon drives the Night Fury away. When danger mounts, Hiccups reign as village chief is tested, both dragon and rider must make impossible decisions to save their own kind.

programme.desc: LEGO Batman stars in his own big-screen adventure in which he goes on a personal journey to overcome his old fear of having a family through sharing his thrilling experience with a boy he had adopted. While trying to save Gotham city from the Jokers hostile takeover, he discovers the need to learn the value of fun-spirited teamwork.

programme.title: The Lego Movie

programme.desc: The film follows six young ninjas who live a double life, as they are warriors who defend their city from evil forces by night while by day theyre ordinary teens dealing with their biggest enemy: high school.

programme.desc: According to the customs of Antarctic penguins, each penguin has to express his love to his mate by singing. But Mumble cant find his soul mate because he cant sing, despite having a great talent for tap dancing. Mumble tries to convince the elders to change their habits.

programme.title: Horob Edterary
programme.desc: When the businessman Yahya Zakaria (Mohamed Farrag) is killed, four people are accused: Adham (Ahmed El Sakka), Mostafa (Amir Karara), Youssef (Mostafa Khater) and Nada (Ghada Adel). Events begin to escalate as the four try to work together to prove their innocence.

programme.title: Rehla 404
programme.desc: A few days before she travels to Mecca to perform Hajj, Ghada faces an emergency which forces her to reach out to people from her tainted past with whom she had cut off contact in order to collect a large sum of money. So, as she collects the money, will she manage to go to Mecca, or get tangled up in the pasts webs?

programme.title: Hawjen
programme.desc: When a human family moves into Hwjn and his familys house in a world where Jinn is compelled to live among humans, their lives are completely upended. Hwjn, who is forbidden by old regulations from mingling, unintentionally falls in love with the human daughter, Sawsan.

programme.title: Arousty
programme.desc: The story follows a young man and woman who go through various situations in their journey to find the right partner, which raises questions about traditional marriage and marriage based on love.

programme.title: Yom Eh Yom Laa
programme.desc: With her wedding day approaching, Sahars fear of getting married magnifies due to the increasing divorce rates she witnesses. To escape such a devastating end, she agrees with her conservative fiance Shafiq to alternate between being married and breaking loose of their bond.

programme.title: ويك إند
programme.desc: Omars life is turned upside down during a nice weekend when he meets the mother of his girlfriend, Samar, and discovers that they have a history.

programme.title: Welad Rizk 2: Awdat Osoud Al-Ard
programme.desc: Three years after the events of the first part, the four brothers try their best to keep their oath to stay away from the life of crime. As one unexpected incident takes place in their lives, everything changes and they find themselves stepping into new worlds in which they must face deadly criminals.

programme.title: 30 Maress
programme.desc: Ali, the fugitive from a murder he does not even know whether he committed it or not, sets out to uncover truth with the help of his friend, the lawyer and his neighbor. Over time, he finds himself embroiled in cases much more dangerous than he imagined, making him on the verge of insanity or murder.

programme.title: Bergen
programme.desc: A biopic about the famous Turkish singer Bergen, who faces many difficulties and tribulations, and tries to be strong against all odds.

programme.title: Kira We El Gin
programme.desc: The reality of Egyptian society during the period of the British occupation with the outbreak of the revolution of 1919, which unties the fate of Ahmed Abdel Hayy Kira and Abdel Qader El Gen who are joined together in their struggle against the English occupier.

programme.title: Casablanca
programme.desc: Three friends: Omar,Oraby and Rashid form a gang of pirates called “Sea Burglars”. They get assigned to a mission against the Mob after a large cargo of diamonds was heisted. Things turn into a web of rivalries and paybacks, when Oraby decides to do the mission on his own and escapes to Morocco.

programme.title: Shamareekh
programme.desc: The film tackles pressures that are placed upon is in life by telling the story of a businessman who falls in love with a girl, when his life reaches a stage of explosive pressures.

programme.title: Bye Bye Tiberias
programme.desc: Filmmaker Lina Soualem travels back in time and place to capture the stories passed on by four generations of daring Palestinian women in her family. The personal journey of each woman featured in the film takes us back to a time slot in history. Despite their dispersed Palestinian identity in different territories, they have taken control over their destinies and influenced the world around them.

programme.title: Hai El Sayeda Zainab
programme.desc: Sherbini leaves the family home on his annual journey to search for certainty and get closer to God, heading to his isolated retreat, and leaving behind a great struggle for power and status.

programme.title: Lets Have Dinner

programme.desc: A story of how greed ruins everything, as it follows the family of Saad who is blinded by his love for money, and looks forward with his wife to reach the family of Muhammad El-Baher, despite the huge social difference between them.

programme.title: Aber Sabeel
programme.desc: The events shed light on the issues of people with disabilities, through the story of a young man with disabilities who marries a girl from this social class, and fate wills that they give birth to a completely healthy child, and this young mans mother, who is in charge of his guardianship, faces greed from the people closest to her, who try to seize her house.

programme.title: One Last Sin
programme.desc: Hisham enters the empire of a feared drug lord under the guise of loyalty, hiding a secret mission to find his missing sister. programme.title: Baba Geh
programme.desc: Hisham finds himself at a crossroads after being laid off from his job in a hotel, due to the coronavirus pandemic. However, he must find work and take care of his family under difficult circumstances.

programme.title: Dehbash
programme.desc: A collection of stories from Kuwaiti society that touches on an important era in the history of Kuwait, following Dehbash, who arrives in Kuwait, where he gets to know Bilal and Shamma, and the three meet with Sheikh Saleh, who offers them a helping hand. As the plague outbreaks, everyone joins hands until it ends.

programme.title: Aljiraj
programme.desc: Naima is responsible for seven children whose father is very negligent and morally corrupt. He attempts to find work abroad and he leaves his wife to raise the children on her own. For how long is she going to bear their burdens?

programme.title: Lembi 8 Giga
programme.desc: Al-Lembi returns as a lawyer that isn’t exactly doing well financially. He gets married to a schoolteacher, but the bills keep piling up and he can’t seem to manage to keep up with them. He gets involved in an accident that turns his life upside down.

programme.title: Eyar Nari
programme.desc: After a clash between demonstrators and security forces, a body from the clash is returned to the morgue. Forensic doctor, Yassin, writes his medical report stating that the victim was shot at close range, unlike the other bodies , problems begin when the medical report is leaked to the media.

programme.title: Khayaal Maatah
programme.desc: The story revolves around a grandfather who stole a rare masterpiece belonging to the late singer (Umm Kulthum) in his youth. Years later, he finds himself chased by those who want to have this piece, which makes him resort to the help of his only grandson.

programme.title: Tayeh fi America
programme.desc: After traveling to the US,Sherif Al Masry impersonates the identity of a man called Adel by accident in a risk that isnt calculated. He only wanted to have a place to stay for the night,but ends up staying in the house and the lie begins to widen more each day.

programme.title: Saeat Reda
programme.desc: In a local neighborhood, the mechanic Reda harbors unrequited feelings for Nour. When he finds an old clock that turns out to be an enchanted time machine, he goes back in time to win his girl’s heart, but he finds himself in some unexpected awkward situations.

programme.title: Sania Wahda
programme.desc: The story follows a young man who gets to know a girl and causes her many problems. But when hes exposed to an accident, his life takes a drastic turn.

programme.desc: Mustatae is a philosophy teacher,renting a room on the roof of a building. He gets expelled for accusing him of practicing political activities, and is forced to practice sorcery and black magic, taking advantage of his intelligence and the ignorance of society until he becomes a well-known and wealthy man.

programme.title: Akher aldonia
programme.desc: Salma is a TV presenter who accidentally gets involved in the murder of a girl. Unable to move on, she consults a psychiatrist who turns out to be the deceased girls brother. Will her crime stand in the way of their budding romance?

programme.title: Tita Rahiba
programme.desc: After his grandfathers death, Raoufs domineering grandmother returns to Egypt, and her stay with her grandson stands in the way of his aspirations. How will he cope?

programme.title: Arab Wood
programme.desc: An artistic news bulletin that presents artistic news in the Arab world, verifying rumors about artists and providing news of international and Hollywood stars in a comprehensive and detailed follow-up of all their activities and news. The program also follows up with all new artistic works and presents critics opinions about them.

programme.title: Kira We El Gin
programme.desc: The reality of Egyptian society during the period of the British occupation with the outbreak of the revolution of 1919, which unties the fate of Ahmed Abdel Hayy Kira and Abdel Qader El Gen who are joined together in their struggle against the English occupier.

programme.title: Albahth An Fediha
programme.desc: As Magdy leaves Upper Egypt for a job, he befriends the playboy Sami who impresses him with his many relationships. After a chance meeting with Hanan, Magdy asks for Samis help to get close to her, something that Sami is happy to provide and support with previous experiences.

programme.title: Si Omar
programme.desc: Gaber Afandi works at Omar Al-Alfys estate, he gets fired by the manager when he discovers forgery in the accounting sheets. He travels to Cairo where he accidentally goes to Al-Alfys house and gets mistaken by the family for their absent son Omar because of the striking resemblance between them.

programme.title: Shantet Hamza
programme.desc: A professional con man (Hamada Hilal) falls in love with a powerful woman who used to work for an infamous con gang.

programme.title: Almish Muhandis Hassan
programme.desc: Hassan is a brilliant engineering student who falls in love with his colleague Maha, but he gets into conflict with her family who reject this relationship.

programme.title: Alnemr Al Aswad
programme.desc: Mohamed flies from his poor neighborhood to Germany searching for a living. As he manages to start a life, he meets his neighbor Abi, who helps him along the way. Eventually, Mohamed starts succeeding as a plumber, and then as a professional boxer.

programme.title: Saheb El-Maqam
programme.desc: When the young businessman Yehia goes through a crisis, he finds that his only hope is a mysterious holy woman named Rouh who starts to help him.

programme.title: Ritsa
programme.desc: Set in Alexandria; the events follow three different characters whose stories are connected by love, which pushes them to make many decisions and causes them to go through many troubles.

programme.title: Khiana Mashroaa
programme.desc: When Hesham Al-Behairy learns that his father wrote him out of his will and gave all his fortune to his older brother, he plots to get rid of his brother and frame it as an honor killing.

programme.title: Al-Athraa Wi Al-Shaar Al-Abyad
programme.desc: When Dawlat, a divorced barren woman, meets Medhat, a love story quickly turns into a successful marriage. But when their adopted teen daughter Posaina start to fall for Medhat, their world is turned upside down.

programme.title: El Rahina
programme.desc: When Mostafa arrives to Ukraine, he witnesses the kidnapping of an Egyptian scientist. Eventually he gets involved in rescuing him, in a country he knows nothing about.

programme.title: Mayn fina alhiramii
programme.desc: The young journalist, Sahar, meets Hussein in London and they return to Egypt, where he meets her father, Asim, the company manager, from whom his twin brother, Sherif, embezzled a large sum of money. After Sherif gets arrested, Hussein tries to sell everything to help him get out of jail.

programme.title: Laf We Dawaran
programme.desc: Nour Kabbani is a tour guide who goes with his family to Sharm el-Sheikh, taking advantage of the companys offer to spend the honeymoon in order to meet an Italian girl named Perla. programme.title: Shaw-ming
programme.desc: The film follows the story of a group of high school students where electronic cheating spreads largely on social networking sites, or what is known as Shaw-ming is helping high school students cheat.

programme.title: Dreams of a Reckless Boy
programme.desc: A movie that depicts the life of a carefree young man who dreams of stardom and fame as he meets actress Nelly Karim and gets infatuated with her. Is it fame he is after? Or is he after genuine love?

programme.title: Alnemr Al Aswad
programme.desc: Mohamed flies from his poor neighborhood to Germany searching for a living. As he manages to start a life, he meets his neighbor Abi, who helps him along the way. Eventually, Mohamed starts succeeding as a plumber, and then as a professional boxer.

programme.title: Almish Muhandis Hassan
programme.desc: Hassan is a brilliant engineering student who falls in love with his colleague Maha, but he gets into conflict with her family who reject this relationship.

programme.title: Ritsa
programme.desc: Set in Alexandria; the events follow three different characters whose stories are connected by love, which pushes them to make many decisions and causes them to go through many troubles.

programme.title: Laf We Dawaran
programme.desc: Nour Kabbani is a tour guide who goes with his family to Sharm el-Sheikh, taking advantage of the companys offer to spend the honeymoon in order to meet an Italian girl named Perla. He finds a girl called Layla who lives in the same villa. Nours family plot with Layla to ruin Nours plans with Perla.

programme.title: Hayah Aw Moot
programme.desc: A man who suffers from a heart attack, sends his daughter to get the medicine, but the pharmacist discovers that he made a mistake while preparing the medicine causing it to become a lethal poison. He tries with the help of the police to find the man and save him before its too late.

programme.title: Mayn fina alhiramii
programme.desc: The young journalist, Sahar, meets Hussein in London and they return to Egypt, where he meets her father, Asim, the company manager, from whom his twin brother, Sherif, embezzled a large sum of money. After Sherif gets arrested, Hussein tries to sell everything to help him get out of jail.

programme.title: Arab Wood
programme.desc: An artistic news bulletin that presents artistic news in the Arab world, verifying rumors about artists and providing news of international and Hollywood stars in a comprehensive and detailed follow-up of all their activities and news. The program also follows up with all new artistic works and presents critics opinions about them.

programme.title: Shaw-ming
programme.desc: The film follows the story of a group of high school students where electronic cheating spreads largely on social networking sites, or what is known as Shaw-ming is helping high school students cheat.

programme.title: Luakanidat almufajat
programme.desc: Two young men open an office for secret police work. A man hires them to find his mistress missing dog. Unable to find the dog, they use a similar dog and go to a hotel to hand over the fake dog but unexpected events occur.

programme.title: Altaawitha
programme.desc: A family of a man, his wife, their son, the mother of the husband and his two sisters, all live together in the old family home. A businessman offers them to buy the house and the children refuse, then a series of strange events start to happen and events escalate.

programme.title: Oqdet Al Khawaja
programme.desc: The movie revolves around the ambitious middle-class young man Faris, who is in love with the daughter of an influential businessman. The duo gets into many mishaps, as Faris sets out to avenge the death of his brother.

programme.title: Shams La Tgheeb
programme.desc: Soha is a spoiled girl whos engaged to Essam. During a trip with her father, she has an accident and loses her sight. As her fiance leaves her, she refuses to have surgery to regain her sight. Dr. Salah uses Essam to persuade her to have the surgery.

programme.title: 85 Jinayat
programme.desc: Colonel Hazem, the governor of womans prison, meets the rich and beautiful Rawia, who lives next door. Their relation grows stronger and she tells him she is miserable with her husband Darwish. The two get arrested for the possession of drugs, and Rawia is sent to the prison where Hazem works.

programme.title: Seraa El Gababera
programme.desc: Lillian is a Jewish dancer who has a number of admirers, including Farid, a wealthy lonely young man. Lillian leaves Farid to go to Palestine. Farid then meets Gawaher, another dancer who is married to El Sebai, who, along with his colleague Sombol, protects her. Gawaher refuses to give any of what she earns to El Sebai, so he attempts to rob and kill Farid.

programme.title: El Harreef
programme.desc: Fares, a shoe-factory worker, has only one passion in life: football. He leads a humble life in a chaotic neighborhood where he plays street football to increase his income. However, neither his marriage nor his job is stable enough. Will football ever be enough to save him?

programme.title: Shams La Tgheeb
programme.desc: Soha is a spoiled girl whos engaged to Essam. During a trip with her father, she has an accident and loses her sight. As her fiance leaves her, she refuses to have surgery to regain her sight. Dr. Salah uses Essam to persuade her to have the surgery.

programme.title: Agazet Gharam
programme.desc: Magdy is an engineer at the High Dam. He travels to Cairo to take some time off with his family. But his wife Dr.Laila, is too busy with her work, which drives him to spend time with his neighbor Elham, taking advantage of her husbands absence, and things develop rapidly.

programme.title: 85 Jinayat

Gawaher refuses to give any of what she earns to El Sebai, so he attempts to rob and kill Farid.

programme.title: Iinaa wabanati
programme.desc: A strict widower lives with his four daughters, but forbids them to socialize or work. When the father retires, he decides to invest his pension in a company that he later discovers has seized his money. He gets injured and the girls are forced to go to work.

programme.title: Wijhat Nazar
programme.desc: A group of blind people live in a place that resembles hell and are not surrounded by any kind of care or appreciation for their difficult situation. Blind man Arafa El Shawaf, who was in prison, comes out, becomes their leader, and tries to expose the head of the authority who does not care about them and does not give them their money.

programme.title: TaTa wa Reeka wa Kazem Bey
programme.desc: Mr. Kazem became rich from conning wealthy women, until he accidentally meets the small time crook Tata and they decide to work together. They try to swindle the rich-looking Rika and compete to win her affection.

programme.title: Iinaa wabanati

programme.title: Alrasif
programme.desc: A story that covers the problems and countless interesting tales that arise within the Egyptian and Arab society in a social framework.

programme.title: Sawak el Hanem
programme.desc: Mrs. Latifa is a descendant of the royal family. She is dominant and controlling over her husband, her reckless son Fayek, and even the servant Fatheya. As Mrs. Latifa hires Hamada as a driver, the unexpected happens when her daughter Afkar falls in love with him. Unfortunately, he loves his poor neighbor.

programme.title: Am Ratiba
programme.desc: Om Ratiba and her younger brother are suffering from their older brother Abd Al-Sabours tyranny. Abd Al-Sabour, whos obsessed with sorcery and charlatanism, refuses her marriage to her neighbor and tries to convince them that he will return after his death to make sure theyre following his orders.

programme.title: Jarimat iilaa rubue
programme.desc: Essam, a film director, gets in over his head when he borrows money from the greedy contractor Mustafa who threatens to report him to the police. Essam has to hide his dilemma from his wife even as he breaks down.

programme.title: Esabet El-Doctor Omar
programme.desc: Omar, is a psychiatrist who returns home and applies new theories in psychotherapy. He meets Reem, a kleptomaniac rich girl, who works as a translator. Omar tries to help her quit stealing and they fall in love.

programme.title: Ashan Khargen
programme.desc: Ramzy is a playboy whose boss tries to wed to his daughter, Laila. When Ramzy and Laila meet, a man they dont know leaves them a bag full of money which sends the real owner of the bag after them.

programme.title: Ghazl Al Banat
programme.desc: The unfortunate Arabic language teacher Hamams luck finally changes, when the opportunity comes to him to be the tutor of the daughter of a wealthy pasha. He falls for her, but when he finds out that shes in love with a reckless man, he tries to save her from him with the help of an officer.

programme.title: Al Raqissa w Al Tabbal
programme.desc: After having trouble with the dancer who worked with him for several months, the drummer Abdo discovers a young dancer Mabahig who lives with her sister and her brother-in-law. He trains her till she becomes a famous dancer.

programme.title: Assef Ala Al Izaag
programme.desc: Hassan (Ahmed Helmy) is a devoted aeronautical engineer who is so busy with his job. He falls in love with Farida and turns to his father (Mahmoud Hamida) for advice, while his mother opposes his way of life. As events unfold, there is an unexpected surprise.

programme.title: Katkout
programme.desc: Katkout is an Upper-Egyptian whose aunt prepares him to sacrifice himself for a family vendetta. Luckily, the police save him to use his physical resemblance to a terrorist named Youssef Khoury. After being trained to replace Khoury, Katkouts national security assignment begins in a comic haste.

programme.title: Iismaeil ys fi aljaysh
programme.desc: Ismail is recruited in the army, he finds it difficult to follow orders which creates a lot of funny situations, he is also in love, but there is another man competing for the love of the girl he loves.

programme.title: Locandet El Fardous
programme.desc: Abdul Mutajali Sulait, a teacher from the village, goes to El Fardos Hotel after he was not welcomed by Attia Al Shalshlamouni, his wife Shafiqa, and his four daughters, whom he treats firmly and forcefully. Meanwhile, Samiha, Attia’s neighbor, constantly quarrels with her husband Masoud because of her jealousy over him and thinks that he is in a relationship with another.

programme.title: Cleopatra
programme.desc: The series takes place at the beginning of the Roman era in Egypt and tells the story of Cleopatra, who became the queen of Egypt before the arrival of Julius Caesar, who fell in love with her. After his death, she then meets Mark Antony, Caesars successor, and begins her long love story with him.

programme.title: Cleopatra

After his death, she then meets Mark Antony, Caesars successor, and begins her long love story with him.

programme.title: Warda Shamia
programme.desc: Warda and Shamia are two sisters who encounter harsh circumstances that lead them to commit murder in their Damascene neighborhood.

programme.title: Al Kawn Fi Kaffah
programme.desc: The series depicts many of the thorny social issues that occur inside the Kuwaiti and Gulf houses in general, through the story of an authoritarian woman who imposes her control over her family.

programme.title: Settohom
programme.desc: After her husband is killed, Settohom gets into several conflicts with her family and tries to raise her children away from problems; however, she is forced to disguise herself as a man to face the difficulties she encounters in life.

programme.title: Suhaila Bint Adim
programme.desc: The events revolve around the story of a strong, wealthy, and controlling woman as she goes through multiple conflicts and problems until many secrets are revealed to her.

programme.title: Sanawat El Greesh
programme.desc: Overnight, conditions change, especially with the outbreak of World War II, which reaches the Gulf, and mines stop people from their work, especially hunting, so Ghaith the son of the teacher Sultana decides to travel, and she long waits for his return.

programme.title: Hareem Tariq
programme.desc: When Tariqs wife, Rima, discovers his infidelity and his marriage to the broadcaster Maisa, both women try to push Tariq to divorce the other, until they discover his marriage to other women.

programme.title: Tarek Show
programme.desc: Tarek Show is a light comedy program that displays sarcastic and caustic acting scenes, which depict many different and diverse topics.

programme.desc: Overnight, conditions change, especially with the outbreak of World War II, which reaches the Gulf, and mines stop people from their work, especially hunting, so Ghaith the son of the teacher Sultana decides to travel, and she long waits for his return.

programme.title: UFO Robo Grendizer
programme.desc: Duke Fleed and Grendizer have no choice but to flee to Earth as Vega launches many attacks on planets to kill them all and take over Earth. With the aid of mankind, Grendizer soon faces Vega when he launches an attack on Earth.

programme.title: Sama Alia
programme.desc: The series tackles the Kuwaiti womans struggle over decades, from the 60s till the present time, through a number of events, mainly the story of the open-minded Rashid who marries Sheikha, who was brought up in a conservative environment, as she begins to go through many transformations in her life.

programme.desc: Events escalate in the second season of the series, and Abdou the coachman seeks revenge and retaliation against his enemies, especially Al Nashwati, who allied this time with Doria. programme.title: Rayya Wi Sekinnah
programme.desc: The story of the lives of sisters Rayya and Sakina, two of the most famous criminals of the 20th century in Egypt as they terrified women and masterminded dozens of deaths. The series presents the circumstances that led them to becoming criminals and the impact of the environment on their future.

programme.title: Sabah Albalad
programme.desc: A comprehensive program that airs on the Sada El Balad channel, presented by the journalist Dina Ramez.

programme.title: Matbakh El Balad
programme.desc: A program broadcasting on the Sada El Balad channel on Saturday and Wednesday of every week, presented by presenter and actress Nada Rahmy. It includes several segments, such as cooking and public health.

programme.title: Be 100 Ragel
programme.desc: The events revolve around Ghalia Abu Al Dahab, who faces challenges and troubles in her life. She is a woman from a poor area who was forced by circumstances to work as a microbus driver after the death of her husband

programme.title: Rayya Wi Sekinnah
programme.desc: The story of the lives of sisters Rayya and Sakina, two of the most famous criminals of the 20th century in Egypt as they terrified women and masterminded dozens of deaths. The series presents the circumstances that led them to becoming criminals and the impact of the environment on their future.

programme.title: Al Arabji
programme.desc: Abdou, a coachman, transports goods on a cart to support his family. However, he struggles with Abu Hamza Al Nashwati and his son due to Abu Hamzas injustice, and to make matters worse, he finds himself facing Bodors hatred and the revenge of Doria Khanum, the wife of Abu Hamzas brother. Will Abdou be able to find love amid these conflicts?

programme.title: Bayt El Shedda
programme.desc: The granddaughter of a sorcerer and magician named Falak returns to her grandfathers house, in order to take revenge on those who burned the house in the past. However, there is a curse chasing her son Seif, where his grandfathers spirit controls his body.

programme.title: Wojooh
programme.desc: The series is split into two stories: Third Face and Metaverse. Third Face tells the story of a doctor who gets released from prison and goes on a quest to find her daughter while struggling with psychosis. On the other hand, Metaverse tells the story of a woman who enters the virtual world to take revenge against her enemies.

programme.title: Dalaa Banat
programme.desc: This comedy series addresses the issue of class distinctions from the perspective of two sisters. One of the sisters is working class while the other is part of the bourgeoisie which creates a variety of comical and ironic scenarios.

programme.desc: The granddaughter of a sorcerer and magician named Falak returns to her grandfathers house, in order to take revenge on those who burned the house in the past. However, there is a curse chasing her son Seif, where his grandfathers spirit controls his body.

programme.title: Rayya Wi Sekinnah
programme.desc: The story of the lives of sisters Rayya and Sakina, two of the most famous criminals of the 20th century in Egypt as they terrified women and masterminded dozens of deaths. programme.title: War for the Planet of the Apes
programme.desc: After a devastating confrontation between the intelligent apes and a rogue army unit, Caesar must fight to balance his desire to avenge his slain wife and son, and his responsibility towards his tribe that is being hunted by the ruthless leader of the army unit.

programme.title: Blood and Wine
programme.desc: A deadbeat husband and father, Alex starts plotting a heist in order to get enough money to start a business. Aware of his frequent dalliances, his long-suffering wife thinks he is cheating and interferes.

programme.title: I Am Mortal
programme.desc: Taking place in the distant future, a small group of rebels challenges the status quo where genetically engineered humans have become immortal.

programme.title: Unstoppable
programme.desc: The work revolves around the veteran American wrestler Anthony Robles, who was born with one leg, however, he defied all odds and won the national championship in 2011 during his participation in the Arizona State University competitions.

programme.title: The Reef: Stalked
programme.desc: As two sisters and their friends go on a Pacific island kayaking adventure, their vacation turns into a nightmare when they are stalked by a great white shark.

programme.title: Three Brothers
programme.desc: An elderly woman dies in a southern Italian farmhouse. Her spouse calls their sons: Romes Raffaele, a judge fearing assassination for a political case; Naples pious Rocco, a boys correctional institute counselor; and Turins Nicola, a factory worker embroiled in labor conflicts. Each of them imagines the unknown fate that awaits them.

programme.title: Send It!
programme.desc: A sportsmans life has changed forever when he decided to leave his home in Texas to participate in the most popular tournament in the world in kitesurfing. Within the journey, he meets a girl with whom they will encounter lot of challenges.

programme.title: American Fighter
programme.desc: After a tragic accident, the college wrestling student Ali Jahani finds himself forced to enter the world of illegal underground fighting, in order to make enough money to save his sick mother.

programme.desc: As FBI agents Karl and Rebecca work to bring down a sex-trafficking ring, they join forces with Texas Ranger Byron whos been pursuing a ruthless serial killer.

programme.title: Send It!
programme.desc: A sportsmans life has changed forever when he decided to leave his home in Texas to participate in the most popular tournament in the world in kitesurfing. Within the journey, he meets a girl with whom they will encounter lot of challenges.

programme.title: Hunters
programme.desc: Several years after a dangerous virus spreads around the world, a soldier continues his mission to protect a group of refugees and the base to which he was assigned, but a new danger appears in the form of brutal mutations that threaten their existence.

programme.title: Plane
programme.desc: The story follows a pilot who finds himself trapped in the middle of a deadly war when circumstances force him to land a commercial plane during a severe storm.

programme.title: Control
programme.desc: An unidentified voice inside a pitch-black chamber gives a stranded mother challenges if she wants to save her daughter. As the mother strains to go on, each new obstacle makes the tasks harder until she finds she has hidden talents.

programme.title: The Marker
programme.desc: A criminal is searching for salvation by following the daughter of the woman he killed while being haunted by guilt.

programme.title: Trauma Center
programme.desc: When a shootout claims the life of his partner, Lt. Wakess attempt to find the perpetrators include enlisting the help of one of the survivors of the incident, a waitress who is getting pursued by the killers to destroy the evidence against them.

programme.title: Three Brothers
programme.desc: An elderly woman dies in a southern Italian farmhouse. Her spouse calls their sons: Romes Raffaele, a judge fearing assassination for a political case; Naples pious Rocco, a boys correctional institute counselor; and Turins Nicola, a factory worker embroiled in labor conflicts. Each of them imagines the unknown fate that awaits them.

programme.title: Midnight in the Switchgrass
programme.desc: As FBI agents Karl and Rebecca work to bring down a sex-trafficking ring, they join forces with Texas Ranger Byron whos been pursuing a ruthless serial killer.

programme.title: The Maze Runner: The Death Cure
programme.desc: As a deadly disease called The Flare spreads while Thomas and his friends need to break into the Last City and survive the WKCD troops as well as attacks by zombies, an arduous mission starts into the deadliest of labyrinths.

programme.title: The Marker
programme.desc: A criminal is searching for salvation by following the daughter of the woman he killed while being haunted by guilt.

programme.title: War for the Planet of the Apes
programme.desc: After a devastating confrontation between the intelligent apes and a rogue army unit, Caesar must fight to balance his desire to avenge his slain wife and son, and his responsibility towards his tribe that is being hunted by the ruthless leader of the army unit.

programme.title: Send It!
programme.desc: A sportsmans life has changed forever when he decided to leave his home in Texas to participate in the most popular tournament in the world in kitesurfing. Within the journey, he meets a girl with whom they will encounter lot of challenges.

programme.title: Three Brothers
