programme.title: Plane
programme.desc: The story follows a pilot who finds himself trapped in the middle of a deadly war when circumstances force him to land a commercial plane during a severe storm.

programme.title: Poker Face
programme.desc: As billionaire Jake hosts his childhood friends at his home in Miami for a poker game, his home is soon under attack from a group of criminals.

programme.title: Black Swan
programme.desc: Nina Sayers is a ballerina whose dedication to playing a dual role in Tchaikovskys "Swan Lake" starts to threaten her mental health as she starts having hallucinations.

programme.title: The Grand Budapest Hotel
programme.desc: The story of Gustave H (Ralph Fiennes) the legendary concerige at a famous Hotel ,who befriends the lobby boy Zero Mustafa (Tony Revolori). When Madame D. (Tilda Swinton) is killed , her son Dmitry (Adrien Brody) decides to take revenge on Gustave, while everyone is after a priceless painting.

programme.title: The Subject
programme.desc: As a successful white documentary filmmaker deals with the aftermath of his previous film, which captured the murder of a black teenager on tape, he becomes targeted by someone whos filming his every move.

programme.title: West Side Story
programme.desc: The story of two street gangs of different ethnic backgrounds as each tries to impose control over the other by eliminating them altogether; a story of love, competition, and rivalry.

programme.title: Inheritance
programme.desc: Mayas quiet life is turned upside down when she discovers that her father, Sam, was a spy in the past, then she finds herself involved in an international intrigue, following in her fathers footsteps.

programme.title: The Aftermath
programme.desc: In post WWII Germany; Rachel Morgan reunites with her husband, Louis, a British Colonel assigned to Hamburg during the reconstruction. Life gets uneasy and turbulent when he decides to share the house with its former owners; a German widow and her disturbed daughter.

programme.title: This Boys Life
programme.desc: Inspired by true events, the film tells the story of a troubled teenager, Toby, who found himself the victim of his stepfathers violence. As the so-called disciplinary methods grated on him, Toby vowed to find a way to leave his abusive home environment.

programme.title: After We Collided
programme.desc: As Tessa struggles to make her turbulent relationship with Hardin work, a shocking surprise from Hardins past complicates things, and Tessa is left with a tough choice to make.

programme.title: The Grand Duke of Corsica
programme.desc: A quirky billionaire who refers to himself as the Grand Duke of Corsica hires grumpy architect Alfred Rott to complete a peculiar project for him. Alfred stays behind to complete the task while an extremely dangerous malaria outbreak spreads widely on the island.

programme.title: Inheritance
programme.desc: Mayas quiet life is turned upside down when she discovers that her father, Sam, was a spy in the past, then she finds herself involved in an international intrigue, following in her fathers footsteps.

programme.desc: Based on the true story of a 60-year-old taxi driver who steals Goyas portrait of the Duke of Wellington from the National Gallery in London in 1961, in an attempt to make the government invest more in care for the elderly.

programme.title: Wild
programme.desc: With her life in shambles, Cheryl seeks a way out of her downward spiral by going on a solo hike on a journey of self-discovery and reevaluation of priorities.

programme.title: The Banshees of Inisherin
programme.desc: When one of their longtime pals breaks up with the other suddenly, the two find themselves at a loss for what to do next.

programme.desc: An American animated series dubbed in Arabic, that follows the policeman Carey Mahoney along with a band of his fellow police officers, and the quick-tempered academy captain Thaddeus Harris, as the team fights crimes and protects the city from thieves and criminals.

programme.title: Al Barunat
programme.desc: The series discusses many issues related to the bourgeois class in society through their negative and positive aspects, and highlights their family problems and their struggle with money and power.

programme.title: Al Adl Wa Al Tuffaha
programme.desc: Al Fadel is appointed minister of the country after the king assigns him this position on the condition that he establish justice among the people. The slave girl Fairuza becomes his property, which is something she has sought for years for a mysterious reason.

programme.title: Al Tabiba
programme.desc: The story of the surgeon Sawsan and her life inside the operating room and her relationship with her father, Doctor Medhat. programme.desc: The events depict the life of the calligrapher vizier Ibn Muqla, his work in the court of the Abbasid caliphs, his invention of the scripts that are attributed to him, such as the thuluth script, and how his involvement in the political conflict led to many problems that ended with his death in prison.

programme.title: Arem
programme.desc: The film addresses the story of anti-colonialism, through a girl named Arim living a simple life in the countryside, but when she is kidnapped on the night of her marriage, her life turns into a nightmare.

programme.title: Al-Nahhat
programme.desc: When Yaman decides to move into the family house as he prepares to teach sculpture in college, his mother opposes his decision since the house has been empty since his fathers death. But the truth is that she is afraid that the move will open a door that was closed years ago.

programme.title: Samra
programme.desc: The story revolves around the marginalized who are neglected by life, but are saved by love, through the story of Samra, the attractive gypsy, who was able to translate the poverty and despair, into a dance wandering the streets. Then she meets a doctor who falls in love with her.

programme.title: YooHoo and Friends
programme.desc: Father Time decides to turn five executives into baby animals, in an attempt to fix all the environmental disasters that have occurred, but the difficulty lies in turning them back into humans, which requires searching for gemstones that can help them return to the human world.

programme.title: Maya the Bee
programme.desc: The events revolve around the bee Maya, who decides to leave the beehive to discover natures beauty. During her journey, she meets other insects and goes through exciting adventures.

programme.title: One Piece
programme.desc: Monkey D. Luffy ate a fruit called Devil Fruit - Rubber to turn into a rubber boy when he was young. At the age of 17, he decides to go on a journey to sail the seas in search of the legendary treasure One Piece that Gol D. Roger mentioned before his execution. He is accompanied by a team of 8 people. What does fate have in store for them?

programme.desc: Rivalries over power and wealth escalate between two families in the hamlet of Abdul Jabbar, and conflicts flare up between them because of a marriage that takes place between two parties of the two families.

programme.title: Sharee Tesaah
programme.desc: After a wealthy businessmans daughter, living on St. 9 in Maadi, suddenly disappears, her husband comes back from abroad to search for her, only to discover that she was murdered in mysterious circumstances, to which several other St. 9 residents are linked.

programme.title: Chrysalis
programme.desc: Nalan, the only child of the Ipekoglu family, was raised without love in a large house by the Bosporus by her controlling mother, Feride. However, her life takes a turn when Sedat, one of the wealthiest men in Turkey, asks for her hand in marriage.

programme.title: Forbidden Apple S5
programme.desc: When Yildiz learns of Çagatays infidelity with Kumru, she faces a brief crisis before returning her attention to her job. After that, she makes the decision to exact revenge and sets off a chain of lies and plots involving everyone involved.

programme.title: Kaderimin Oyunu
programme.desc: After Cemal abandons his wife and two kids, a tragic event forces Asiye to flee with her two kids, but she is unaware that taking refuge in the Demirhan palace thanks to Mahir is not what it seems to be.

programme.title: Kumkum Bhagya
programme.desc: Based on Jane Austens novel, the series deals with the lives of two brothers who are different in character, behavior, relationships, and even in their personal view of the world.

programme.title: Doosri Maa
programme.desc: In an attempt to make peace with her husbands past and improve her relationship with his son, a lady chooses to raise her illegitimate child after he died in a terrible accident with his mistress, but she is mocked by her community for doing so.
